17711768Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RomanNumeralDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static int ToInt(string s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine              var last = 0;Di2015NewLine              return s.Reverse().Select(NumeralValue).Sum(v =>Di2015NewLine              {                    Di2015NewLine                var r = (v >= last)? v : -v;Di2015NewLine                last = v;Di2015NewLine                return r;Di2015NewLine              });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int NumeralValue(char c)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (c)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 'I': return 1;Di2015NewLine                case 'V': return 5;Di2015NewLine                case 'X': return 10;Di2015NewLine                case 'L': return 50;Di2015NewLine                case 'C': return 100;Di2015NewLine                case 'D': return 500;Di2015NewLine                case 'M': return 1000;                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17712268Di2015UniqueSeparator    <form id="form1" runat="server">Di2015NewLine    <div>Di2015NewLine    <asp:TextBox ID="txt" runat="server"></asp:TextBox>Di2015NewLine    <asp:CheckBox ID="cb" runat="server"></asp:CheckBox>Di2015NewLine    </div>Di2015NewLine    </form>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var controls = form1.Controls;Di2015NewLine    var tbCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    var cbCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    CountControls(ref tbCount, controls, ref cbCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Response.Write(tbCount);Di2015NewLine    Response.Write(cbCount);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void CountControls(ref int tbCount, ControlCollection controls, ref int cbCount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (Control wc in controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (wc is TextBox)Di2015NewLine            tbCount++;Di2015NewLine        else if (wc is CheckBox)Di2015NewLine            cbCount++;Di2015NewLine        else if(wc.Controls.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            CountControls(ref tbCount, wc.Controls, ref cbCount);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17712275Di2015UniqueSeparator// parse the document (this is your doc but I've made the xml parseable)Di2015NewLinevar doc = XDocument.Parse(@"<chars>Di2015NewLine        <character name=""MyChar1"">Di2015NewLine        <skill1 type=""attack"" damage=""30"">Di2015NewLine            description of skill1Di2015NewLine            <name>Skill name</name>Di2015NewLine            <class1 type=""The Class Type""></class1>Di2015NewLine            <class2 type=""The Class Type 2""></class2>Di2015NewLine        </skill1>Di2015NewLine        </character>Di2015NewLine    <character name=""MyChar2"">Di2015NewLine        <skill1 type=""attack"" damage=""30""></skill1>Di2015NewLine    </character>Di2015NewLine</chars>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Access a skill1 type(attribute) where the name(attribute) is "MyChar" Di2015NewLine// this is pretty easy with LINQ. We first get all descendant nodes of type "character"Di2015NewLinevar skillWhereNameIsMyChar1 = doc.Descendants("character")Di2015NewLine    // then take the single one with an attribute named "value"Di2015NewLine    .Single(ch => ch.Attribute("name") != null && ch.Attribute("name").Value == "MyChar1")Di2015NewLine    // and take that element's child element of type skill1 Di2015NewLine    .Element("skill1");Di2015NewLine// this will print <skill1 ... /skill1>. However, this is an XElement object, not a stringDi2015NewLine// so you can continue to access inner text, attributes, children etc.Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(skillWhereNameIsMyChar1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 2. Access the description of skill1 where name(att) is "MyChar1"Di2015NewLine// this is tricky because the description text is just floating among other tagsDi2015NewLine// if description were wrapped in <description></description>, this would be simplyDi2015NewLine// var description = skillWhereNameIsMyChar1.Element("description").Value;Di2015NewLine// here's the hacky way I found to get it in the current xml:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// first get the full value (inner text) of the skill node (includes "Skill Name")Di2015NewLinevar fullValue = skillWhereNameIsMyChar1.Value;Di2015NewLine// then get the concatenated full values of all child nodes (= "Skill Name")Di2015NewLinevar innerValues = string.Join("", skillWhereNameIsMyChar1.Elements().Select(e => e.Value));Di2015NewLine// get the description by dropping off the trailing characters that are actually inner valuesDi2015NewLine// by limiting the length to the full length - the length of the non-description charactersDi2015NewLinevar description = fullValue.Substring(0, length: fullValue.Length - innerValues.Length);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(description);Di2015NewLine

17714889Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid AnyMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HandleException.GlobalTryCatch(() => { /* action 1 */}, result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // should we check result to continue?Di2015NewLine    // if so, this is a typical error-code approach, which annihilates Di2015NewLine    // all preferences, provided by .NET exceptions;Di2015NewLine    // if we shouldn't check it, what would be the behavior of our code,Di2015NewLine    // if the state is broken after action 1? Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HandleException.GlobalTryCatch(() => { /* action 2 */}, result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the same questionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HandleException.GlobalTryCatch(() => { /* action 3 */}, result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17715192Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<string> GetFileList(NetworkCredential credential, string FTPSite, string FTPFolder, string extension)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine credential;Di2015NewLine                request.UseBinary = true;Di2015NewLine                request.EnableSsl = true;Di2015NewLine                request.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory;Di2015NewLine                FtpWebResponse response = null;Di2015NewLine                response = (FtpWebResponse) request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine                Stream responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine                StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLine                LSOutput = files:");Di2015NewLine                PrepareLog(LSOutput);Di2015NewLine                downloaded = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                retries++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (downloaded)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine f.ToLower().EndsWith(extension.ToLower())).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PrepareLogAndEmail("Total " + extension.ToLower() + " files found: " + files.Count, LogMessageType.Simple);Di2015NewLine            return files;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PrepareLogAndEmail("Failed to download file", LogMessageType.Simple);Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17716087Di2015UniqueSeparator@echo offDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif %1x==x goto ERRORDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET ProjectDir=%1Di2015NewLineSET SubWCRev="C:\\Program Files\\TortoiseSVN\\bin\\SubWCRev.exe"Di2015NewLineif exist %SubWCRev% goto USESUBWCREVDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineREM Default to copying a default versionDi2015NewLinecopy %ProjectDir%\\Properties\\AssemblyInfo.default.cs %ProjectDir%\\Properties\\AssemblyInfo.csDi2015NewLineecho defaultDi2015NewLinegoto ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineREM We don't want to modify AssemblyInfo.cs every time, only when a revisionDi2015NewLineREM changes. 17719268Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T DeepCopy<T>(this T parent) where T : new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var newParent = new T();Di2015NewLine    foreach (FieldInfo p in typeof(T).GetFields())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (p.Name.ToLower() != "id")Di2015NewLine            p.SetValue(newParent, p.GetValue(parent));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            p.SetValue(newParent, 0);Di2015NewLine        if (p.FieldType.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine            p.FieldType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IEnumerable<>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dynamic children = p.GetValue(parent);Di2015NewLine            dynamic newChildren = p.GetValue(parent);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < children.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newChild = DeepCopy(children[i]);Di2015NewLine                newChildren.SetValue(newChild, i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return newParent;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17723831Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Assembly Compile(string[] source, string[] references) {Di2015NewLine        CodeDomProvider provider = new CSharpCodeProvider();Di2015NewLine        CompilerParameters cp = new CompilerParameters(references);Di2015NewLine        cp.GenerateExecutable = false;Di2015NewLine        cp.GenerateInMemory = true;Di2015NewLine        cp.TreatWarningsAsErrors = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            CompilerResults res = provider.CompileAssemblyFromSource(cp, source);Di2015NewLine            // ...Di2015NewLine            return res.Errors.Count == 0 ? res.CompiledAssembly : null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            // ...Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Execute(Assembly a, string className, string methodName) {Di2015NewLine        Type t = a.GetType(className);Di2015NewLine        if (t == null) throw new Exception("Type not found!");Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo method = t.GetMethod(methodName, BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);          // Get methodDi2015NewLine        if (method == null) throw new Exception("Method '" + methodName + "' not found!");                                  // Method not foundDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object instance =  Activator.CreateInstance(t, this);Di2015NewLine        object ret = method.Invoke(instance, null); Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17728486Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override Expression VisitMethodCall(MethodCallExpression node)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Only rewrite List.Contains()Di2015NewLine    if (!node.Method.Name.Equals("Contains",Di2015NewLine                                 StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitMethodCall(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Extract parameters from original expressionDi2015NewLine    var sourceList = node.Object;      // The list being searchedDi2015NewLine    var target = node.Arguments[0];    // The thing being searched forDi2015NewLine    var newMethod = GetType().GetMethod("InList",Di2015NewLine                                        BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create new expressionDi2015NewLine    var newExpression = Expression.Call(newMethod, target, sourceList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newExpression;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17731055Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class OutputDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<Out, Action<string, Color>> registeredWriters = new Dictionary<Out, Action<string, Color>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly Output Instance = new Output();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Output() { } // Empty private constructor so another instance cannot be created.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Unregister(Out outType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (registeredWriters.ContainsKey(outType))Di2015NewLine            registeredWriters.Remove(outType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assumes caller will not combine the flags for outType hereDi2015NewLine    public void Register(Out outType, Action<string, Color> writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (writer == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("writer");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (registeredWriters.ContainsKey(outType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // You could throw an exception, such as InvalidOperationException if you don't want to Di2015NewLine            // allow a different writer assigned once one has already been.Di2015NewLine            registeredWriters[outType] = writer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            registeredWriters.Add(outType, writer);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteLine(Color color, string str, Const.Out output = Const.Out.Debug & Const.Out.Main)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool includeDebug = false;Di2015NewLine        #if DEBUGDi2015NewLine        includeDebug = true;Di2015NewLine        #endifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var outType in registeredWriters.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (outType == Const.Out.Debug && !includeDebug)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bitmask(output, outType))Di2015NewLine                registeredWriters[outType](str, color);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17738668Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat4 FadeEffectShader(PixelInputType input) : SV_TargetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float4 color;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    color = shaderTexture.Sample(SampleType, input.tex);Di2015NewLine    color = color * 0.01;Di2015NewLine    if(color.r<0.01) color.r = 0;Di2015NewLine    if(color.g<0.01) color.g = 0;Di2015NewLine    if(color.b<0.01) color.b = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return color;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17738974Di2015UniqueSeparator    static List<Func<TEntity, TCriteria, bool>> GetCriteriaFunctions<TEntity, TCriteria>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var criteriaFunctions = new List<Func<TEntity, TCriteria, bool>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // searching for nullable properties of criteriaDi2015NewLine        var criteriaProperties = typeof(TCriteria)Di2015NewLine            .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine            .Where(p => p.PropertyType.IsGenericType && p.PropertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in criteriaProperties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this is entity parameterDi2015NewLine            var entityParameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntity));Di2015NewLine            // this is criteria parameterDi2015NewLine            var criteriaParameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TCriteria));Di2015NewLine            // this is criteria property access: "criteria.SomeProperty"Di2015NewLine            var criteriaPropertyExpression = Expression.Property(criteriaParameterExpression, property);Di2015NewLine            // this is testing for equality between criteria property and entity property;Di2015NewLine            // note, that criteria property should be converted first;Di2015NewLine            // also, this code makes assumption, that entity and criteria properties have the same namesDi2015NewLine            var testingForEqualityExpression = Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Convert(criteriaPropertyExpression, property.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments()[0]), Di2015NewLine                Expression.Property(entityParameterExpression, property.Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // criteria.SomeProperty == null ? true : ((EntityPropertyType)criteria.SomeProperty == entity.SomeProperty)Di2015NewLine            var body = Expression.Condition(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Equal(criteriaPropertyExpression, Expression.Constant(null)), Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant(true),Di2015NewLine                testingForEqualityExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // let's compile lambda to methodDi2015NewLine            var criteriaFunction = Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, TCriteria, bool>>(body, entityParameterExpression, criteriaParameterExpression).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            criteriaFunctions.Add(criteriaFunction);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return criteriaFunctions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17738974Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CustomerCriteriaDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int? Age { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool? IsNew { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CustomerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Age { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsNew { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17738974Di2015UniqueSeparator        var criteriaFunctions = GetCriteriaFunctions<Customer, CustomerCriteria>();Di2015NewLine        var customer1 = new Customer { Name = "John", Age = 35, IsNew = false };Di2015NewLine        var customer2 = new Customer { Name = "Mary", Age = 27, IsNew = true };Di2015NewLine        var criteria1 = new CustomerCriteria { Age = 35 };Di2015NewLine        var criteria2 = new CustomerCriteria { IsNew = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Is match: {0}", criteriaFunctions.All(f => f(customer1, criteria1)));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Is match: {0}", criteriaFunctions.All(f => f(customer2, criteria1)));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Is match: {0}", criteriaFunctions.All(f => f(customer1, criteria2)));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Is match: {0}", criteriaFunctions.All(f => f(customer2, criteria2)));Di2015NewLine

17740197Di2015UniqueSeparator public static void WriteToTextFile(string textLog)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    FileStream objFS = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string strFilePath = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory + @"\\Exception Log\\" + System.DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd ") + "Exception.log";Di2015NewLine    if (!File.Exists(strFilePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine          objFS = new FileStream(strFilePath, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine          objFS = new FileStream(strFilePath, FileMode.Append);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (StreamWriter Sr = new StreamWriter(objFS))Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         Sr.WriteLine(System.DateTime.Now.ToShortTimeString() + "---" + textLog);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

17746239Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    [JsonConverter(typeof(RolesConverter))]Di2015NewLine    public Role[] Roles { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17746239Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass RolesConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return objectType == typeof(Role[]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // deserialize as objectDi2015NewLine        var roles = serializer.Deserialize<JObject>(reader);Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<Role>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create an array out of the propertiesDi2015NewLine        foreach (JProperty property in roles.Properties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var role = property.Value.ToObject<Role>();Di2015NewLine            role.Id = int.Parse(property.Name);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(role);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17746576Di2015UniqueSeparator   public static void ArrangeColumns(ListView listView, params String [] order) {Di2015NewLine      listView.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      try { Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < order.Length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine          Boolean found = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          for (int j = 0; j < listView.Columns.Count; ++j) {Di2015NewLine            if (String.Equals(listView.Columns[j].Text, order[i], StringComparison.Ordinal)) {Di2015NewLine              listView.Columns[j].DisplayIndex = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              found = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          if (!found) Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Column " + order[i] + " is not found.", "order"); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      } Di2015NewLine      finally {Di2015NewLine        listView.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ArrangeColumns(myListView, "name", "job", "phone", "school", "age");Di2015NewLine
17746576Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SwapSubItems(ListView listView, int fromIndex, int toIndex) {Di2015NewLine  if (fromIndex == toIndex)Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (fromIndex > toIndex) {Di2015NewLine    int h = fromIndex;Di2015NewLine    fromIndex = toIndex;Di2015NewLine    toIndex = h;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  listView.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  try {Di2015NewLine    foreach (ListViewItem line in listView.Items) {Di2015NewLine      var subItem = line.SubItems[fromIndex];Di2015NewLine      line.SubItems.RemoveAt(fromIndex);Di2015NewLine      line.SubItems.Insert(toIndex, subItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (listView.Columns.Count > toIndex) {Di2015NewLine        var column = listView.Columns[fromIndex];Di2015NewLine        listView.Columns.RemoveAt(fromIndex);Di2015NewLine        listView.Columns.Insert(toIndex, column);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  finally {Di2015NewLine    listView.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemyListView.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetry {Di2015NewLine  // Job Di2015NewLine  SwapSubItems(myListView, 4, 1);Di2015NewLine  // Phone (now, when Job moved, Phone is a 4th column)Di2015NewLine  SwapSubItems(myListView, 4, 2);Di2015NewLine  // School (now, when Job and Phone moved, School is a 4th column)Di2015NewLine  SwapSubItems(myListView, 4, 3);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefinally {Di2015NewLine  myListView.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17747619Di2015UniqueSeparatorWH_CALLWNDPROC
17747619Di2015UniqueSeparatorWH_CALLWNDRETPROC
17747619Di2015UniqueSeparator/* The handle to the hook is stored as a shared global variable and is theDi2015NewLine * same for all hooked processes. We achieve that by placing it in theDi2015NewLine * shared data segment of the DLL.Di2015NewLine *Di2015NewLine * Note that shared global variables must be explicitly initialized.Di2015NewLine *Di2015NewLine * And also note that this is really not the ideal way of doing this; it's justDi2015NewLine * an easy way to get going. The better solution is to use a memory-mapped file.Di2015NewLine * See Also: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/h90dkhs0.aspxDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLine#pragma comment(linker, "/section:.SHARED,rws")Di2015NewLine#pragma data_seg(".SHARED") /* begin the shared data segment */Di2015NewLine   HHOOK g_hhkCallWndProcRet = NULL;Di2015NewLine#pragma data_seg()          /* end the shared data segment and default back to normal behavior */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineLRESULT CALLBACK CallWndRetProc(int nCode, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   /* If nCode is greater than or equal to HC_ACTION,Di2015NewLine    * we should process the message. */Di2015NewLine   if (nCode >= HC_ACTION)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      /* Retrieve a pointer to the structure that contains details aboutDi2015NewLine       * the message, and see if it is one that we want to handle. */Di2015NewLine      const LPCWPRETSTRUCT lpcwprs = (LPCWPRETSTRUCT)lParam;Di2015NewLine      switch (lpcwprs->message)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         /* ...SNIP: process the messages we're interested in ... */Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   /* At this point, we are either not processing the messageDi2015NewLine    * (because nCode is less than HC_ACTION),Di2015NewLine    * or we've already finished processing it.Di2015NewLine    * Either way, pass the message on. */Di2015NewLine   return CallNextHookEx(g_hhkCallWndProcRet, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBOOL __stdcall InstallHook(void)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   /* Try to install the WH_CALLWNDPROCRET hook,Di2015NewLine    * if it is not already installed. */Di2015NewLine   if (!g_hhkCallWndProcRet)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      g_hhkCallWndProcRet = SetWindowsHookEx(WH_CALLWNDPROCRET,Di2015NewLine                                             CallWndRetProc,Di2015NewLine                                             g_hinstDLL,Di2015NewLine                                             0);Di2015NewLine      if (!g_hhkCallWndProcRet)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         /* ...SNIP: handle failure condition ... */Di2015NewLine         return FALSE;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return TRUE;  /* return success */Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBOOL __stdcall RemoveHook(void)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   /* Try to remove the WH_CALLWNDPROCRET hook, if it is installed. */Di2015NewLine   if (g_hhkCallWndProcRet)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if (!UnhookWindowsHookEx(g_hhkCallWndProcRet))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         /* ...SNIP: handle failure condition ... */Di2015NewLine         return FALSE;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      g_hhkCallWndProcRet = NULL;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return TRUE;  /* return success */Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17749997Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass LoopStream : WaveStreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    WaveStream sourceStream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LoopStream(WaveStream source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.sourceStream = source;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override WaveFormat WaveFormatDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return sourceStream.WaveFormat; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long LengthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return long.MaxValue / 32; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return sourceStream.Position;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sourceStream.Position = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool HasData(int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // infinite loopDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int read = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (read < count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int required = count - read;Di2015NewLine            int readThisTime = sourceStream.Read(buffer, offset + read, required);Di2015NewLine            if (readThisTime < required)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sourceStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (sourceStream.Position >= sourceStream.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sourceStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            read += readThisTime;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return read;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sourceStream.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        base.Dispose(disposing);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17753854Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RecursiveBuildUpContainerExtension : UnityContainerExtension {Di2015NewLine    protected override void Initialize(){Di2015NewLine        Context.Strategies.Add( new RecursiveBuildUpBuilderStrategy( Context.Container ), UnityBuildStage.PreCreation );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RecursiveBuildUpBuilderStrategy : BuilderStrategy {Di2015NewLine    readonly IUnityContainer container;Di2015NewLine    public RecursiveBuildUpBuilderStrategy( IUnityContainer container ) {Di2015NewLine        this.container = container;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void PreBuildUp( IBuilderContext context ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( context.Existing == null ) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach( var prop in context.Existing.GetType( ).GetProperties( ) ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( ContainsType<DependencyAttribute>( prop.GetCustomAttributes( true ) ) ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if( prop.GetValue( context.Existing, null ) == null ) {Di2015NewLine                    var value = container.Resolve( prop.PropertyType );Di2015NewLine                    prop.GetSetMethod( ).Invoke( context.Existing, new[] { value } );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    var value = container.BuildUp( prop.PropertyType, prop.GetValue( context.Existing, null ) );Di2015NewLine                    prop.GetSetMethod( ).Invoke( context.Existing, new[] { value } );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var method in context.Existing.GetType().GetMethods() ){Di2015NewLine            if( ContainsType<InjectionMethodAttribute>( method.GetCustomAttributes( true ))){Di2015NewLine                var argsInfo = method.GetParameters( );Di2015NewLine                var args = new object[argsInfo.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for( int i = 0; i < argsInfo.Length; i++ ) {Di2015NewLine                    args[i] = container.Resolve( argsInfo[i].ParameterType );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                method.Invoke( context.Existing, args );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.BuildComplete = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool ContainsType<T>( IEnumerable<object> objects ){Di2015NewLine        foreach (var o in objects){Di2015NewLine            if( o is T ) return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17754758Di2015UniqueSeparatorPredicate ToOrTree(List<Foo> fooList) {Di2015NewLine    if (fooList.Count > 2) {Di2015NewLine        var firstHalf = fooList.Count / 2;Di2015NewLine        var lhs = ToOrTree(fooList.Take(firstHalf).ToList());Di2015NewLine        var rhs = ToOrTree(fooList.Skip(firstHalf).ToList());Di2015NewLine        return lhs.Or(rhs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Predicate res = PredicateBuilder.Create<Foo>(Di2015NewLine        foo => fooList[0].Bar == foo.Bar &&  fooList[0].Baz == foo.BazDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine    if (fooList.Count == 2) {Di2015NewLine        res = res.Or(Di2015NewLine            foo => fooList[1].Bar == foo.Bar &&  fooList[1].Baz == foo.BazDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17756426Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring GetValue(Control c) {Di2015NewLine   // using this form will allow invalid path detectionDi2015NewLine   TextBox tb;Di2015NewLine   ComboBox cb;Di2015NewLine   if ((tb = c as TextBox) != null) { Di2015NewLine     return tb.Text;Di2015NewLine   } else if ((cb = c as ComboBox) != null) {Di2015NewLine     return GetValue(cb);Di2015NewLine   } else {Di2015NewLine     throw new Exception("Unsupported control");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// but we could use overloading once refined ..Di2015NewLinestring GetValue(ComboBox cb) {Di2015NewLine  return cb.SelectedValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17756426Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IFetchValue {Di2015NewLine    string FetchValue(Control c);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class Fetcher<T>: IFetchValue where T : Control {Di2015NewLine  abstract protected FetchControlValue(T c);Di2015NewLine  public string FetchValue (Control c) {Di2015NewLine    return FetchControlValue((T)c);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass TextBoxFetcher: Fetcher<TextBox> {Di2015NewLine  protected string FetchControlValue (TextBox tb) {Di2015NewLine     return tb.Value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ComboBoxFetcher: Fetcher<ComboBox> {Di2015NewLine  protected string FetchControlValue (ComboBox cb) {Di2015NewLine     return cb.SelectedValue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This could be initialized via reflection of allDi2015NewLine// Fetcher<T>/IFetchValue types with a bit more work.Di2015NewLineIDictionary<Type, IFetchValue> map = new Dictionary<Type, IFetchValue> {Di2015NewLine  { typeof(TextBox), new TextBoxFetcher() },Di2015NewLine  { typeof(ComboBox), new ComboBoxFetcher() },Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring GetValue(Control c) {Di2015NewLine  IFetchValue fetcher;Di2015NewLine  // This should be smarter to also try parent types orDi2015NewLine  // check general assignability.Di2015NewLine  if (c != null && map.TryGetValue(c.GetType(), out fetcher)) {Di2015NewLine    return fetcher(c);Di2015NewLine  } else {Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Whoops!");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17758190Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool Worked = false;Di2015NewLine    string Password = "testing";Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Password: " + Password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // == Encode then decode 64 test. DecPass64 should equal password == //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Encodes to Base64 using ToBase64TransformDi2015NewLine    string EncPass64 = Base64Helper.EncodeString(Password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Decodes a Base64 string using FromBase64TransformDi2015NewLine    string DecPass64 = Base64Helper.DecodeString(EncPass64);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Test if base 64 ecoding / decoding worksDi2015NewLine    Worked = (Password == DecPass64);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Base64 Pass Encoded: " + EncPass64);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Base64 Pass Decoded: " + DecPass64);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Base64 Encode to Base64 Decode Worked? : " + Worked); // TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // gspassenc uses XOR to switch passwords back and forth between encrypted and decryptedDi2015NewLine    byte [] passwordbytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Password);Di2015NewLine    byte [] bytes_GsEncodedPass = gspassenc(passwordbytes);Di2015NewLine    string GsEncodedPass = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(bytes_GsEncodedPass);Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes_GsDecodedPass = gspassenc(bytes_GsEncodedPass);Di2015NewLine    string GsDecodedPass = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(bytes_GsDecodedPass);Di2015NewLine    Worked = (Password == GsDecodedPass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // GsDecodedPass should equal the original PasswordDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("GsPass Encoded: " + GsEncodedPass);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("GsPass Decoded: " + GsDecodedPass);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("GsEncode to GsDecode Worked? : " + Worked); // TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Bas64 encode the encrypted password. Then decode the base64. B64_GsDecodedPass should equalDi2015NewLine    // the GsEncoded Password... But it doesn't for some reason!Di2015NewLine    string B64_GsEncodedPass = Convert.ToBase64String(bytes_GsEncodedPass);Di2015NewLine    byte []bytes_B64_GsDecodedPass = Convert.FromBase64String(B64_GsEncodedPass);Di2015NewLine    string B64_GsDecodedPass = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(bytes_B64_GsDecodedPass);Di2015NewLine    Worked = (B64_GsDecodedPass == GsEncodedPass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Print resultsDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Base64 Encoded GsPass: " + B64_GsEncodedPass);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Base64 Decoded GsPass: " + B64_GsDecodedPass);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Decoded == GS Encoded Pass? : " + Worked); // FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Stop console from closing till we say soDi2015NewLine    Console.Read();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int gslame(int num)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int c = (num >> 16) & 0xffff;Di2015NewLine    int a = num & 0xffff;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    c *= 0x41a7;Di2015NewLine    a *= 0x41a7;Di2015NewLine    a += ((c & 0x7fff) << 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (a < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        a &= 0x7fffffff;Di2015NewLine        a++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    a += (c >> 15);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (a < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        a &= 0x7fffffff;Di2015NewLine        a++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return a;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] gspassenc(byte [] pass)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int a = 0;Di2015NewLine    int num = 0x79707367; // gspyDi2015NewLine    int len = pass.Length;Di2015NewLine    byte[] newPass = new byte[len];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        num = gslame(num);Di2015NewLine        a = num % 0xFF;Di2015NewLine        newPass[i] = (byte)(pass[i] ^ a);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newPass;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17762224Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic RNGCryptoServiceProvider provider = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int NextRandomDigit() {Di2015NewLine  Byte[] bytes = new Byte[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (true) {Di2015NewLine    provider.GetBytes(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // since GetBytes returns value in a range of [0..255], we should skip [250..255]Di2015NewLine    // in order to value % 10 being uniformly distributedDi2015NewLine    if (bytes[0] >= 250)Di2015NewLine      continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return bytes[0] % 10;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Constructing long digit by digitDi2015NewLine// Assuming that numberOfDigits is small enough (18 or less) Di2015NewLine// for returning value being of type longDi2015NewLinepublic static long NextRandomLong(int numberOfDigits) {Di2015NewLine  long result = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < numberOfDigits; ++i)Di2015NewLine    result = result * 10 + NextRandomDigit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Constructing number in String representation digit by digitDi2015NewLinepublic static String NextRandomString(int numberOfDigits) {Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder Sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < numberOfDigits; ++i)Di2015NewLine    Sb.Append((Char) ('0' + NextRandomDigit()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return Sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17764447Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static PartialShuffle<T>(IList<T> source, int count, Random random)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Pick a random element out of the remaining elements,Di2015NewLine        // and swap it into place.Di2015NewLine        int index = i + random.Next(source.Count - i);Di2015NewLine        T tmp = source[index];Di2015NewLine        source[index] = source[i];Di2015NewLine        source[i] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17774005Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<TSource> OfTypes<TSource>(Di2015NewLine        this IQueryable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine        params Type[] types)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!types.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return source;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TSource), "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression finalExpression = Expression.TypeIs(param, types.First());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var type in types.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            finalExpression = Expression.OrElse(Di2015NewLine                Expression.TypeIs(param, type),Di2015NewLine                finalExpression);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lambdaExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource, bool>>(Di2015NewLine            finalExpression, param);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return source.Where(lambdaExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17774286Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueryPerformanceCounter
17774286Di2015UniqueSeparatorRDTSC
17774286Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueryPerformanceCounter
17774286Di2015UniqueSeparatorRDTSC
17774286Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueryPerformanceCounter
17774286Di2015UniqueSeparatorRDTSC
17774286Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat ProcSpeedCalc()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine        RdTSC:Di2015NewLine          It's the Pentium instruction "ReaD Time Stamp Counter". It measures theDi2015NewLine          number of clock cycles that have passed since the processor was reset, as aDi2015NewLine          64-bit number. That's what the <CODE>_emit</CODE> lines do.Di2015NewLine    */Di2015NewLine    // Microsoft inline assembler knows the rdtsc instruction.  No need for emit.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // variables for the CPU cycle counter (unknown rate):Di2015NewLine    __int64 tscBefore, tscAfter, tscCheck;Di2015NewLine    // variables for the Performance Counter 9steady known rate):Di2015NewLine    LARGE_INTEGER hpetFreq, hpetBefore, hpetAfter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // retrieve performance-counter frequency per second:Di2015NewLine    if (!QueryPerformanceFrequency(&hpetFreq)) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int retryLimit = 10;    Di2015NewLine    do {Di2015NewLine        // read CPU cycle countDi2015NewLine        _asmDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rdtscDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR tscBefore, eaxDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR [tscBefore + 4], edxDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // retrieve the current value of the performance counter:Di2015NewLine        QueryPerformanceCounter(&hpetBefore);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // read CPU cycle count again, to detect context switchDi2015NewLine        _asmDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rdtscDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR tscCheck, eaxDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR [tscCheck + 4], edxDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while ((tscCheck - tscBefore) > 800 && (--retryLimit) > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    do {Di2015NewLine        // read CPU cycle countDi2015NewLine        _asmDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rdtscDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR tscAfter, eaxDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR [tscAfter + 4], edxDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // retrieve the current value of the performance counter:Di2015NewLine        QueryPerformanceCounter(&hpetAfter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // read CPU cycle count again, to detect context switchDi2015NewLine        _asmDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rdtscDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR tscCheck, eaxDi2015NewLine            mov DWORD PTR [tscCheck + 4], edxDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while ((tscCheck - tscAfter) > 800 && (--retryLimit) > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // stop-start is speed in Hz divided by 1,000,000 is speed in MHzDi2015NewLine    return (double)(tscAfter - tscBefore) / (double)(hpetAfter.QuadPart - hpetBefore.QuadPart) * (double)hpetFreq.QuadPart / 1.0e6;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17774375Di2015UniqueSeparator//converting to hexadecimalDi2015NewLine    -(NSString*)hexRepresentationWithSpaces_AS:(BOOL)spacesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const unsigned char* bytes = (const unsigned char*)[self bytes];Di2015NewLine        NSUInteger nbBytes = [self length];Di2015NewLine        //If spaces is true, insert a space every this many input bytes (twice this many output characters).Di2015NewLine        static const NSUInteger spaceEveryThisManyBytes = 4UL;Di2015NewLine        //If spaces is true, insert a line-break instead of a space every this many spaces.Di2015NewLine        static const NSUInteger lineBreakEveryThisManySpaces = 4UL;Di2015NewLine        const NSUInteger lineBreakEveryThisManyBytes = spaceEveryThisManyBytes * lineBreakEveryThisManySpaces;Di2015NewLine        NSUInteger strLen = 2*nbBytes + (spaces ? nbBytes/spaceEveryThisManyBytes : 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        NSMutableString* hex = [[NSMutableString alloc] initWithCapacity:strLen];Di2015NewLine        for(NSUInteger i=0; i<nbBytes; ) {Di2015NewLine            [hex appendFormat:@"%02X", bytes[i]];Di2015NewLine            //We need to increment here so that the every-n-bytes computations are right.Di2015NewLine            ++i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (spaces) {Di2015NewLine                if (i % lineBreakEveryThisManyBytes == 0) [hex appendString:@"\\n"];Di2015NewLine                else if (i % spaceEveryThisManyBytes == 0) [hex appendString:@" "];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return [hex autorelease];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineNSData *imageData = UIImagePNGRepresentation(myImage.image);Di2015NewLineNSString* hex = [imageData hexRepresentationWithSpaces_AS:YES];Di2015NewLine

17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorO
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat GetArea(List<Vector2> points)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float area2 = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int numPoint = 0; numPoint < points.Count - 1; numPoint++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyPoint point = points[numPoint];Di2015NewLine        MyPoint nextPoint = points[numPoint + 1];Di2015NewLine        area2 += point.x * nextPoint.y - point.y * nextPoint.x;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return area2 / 2f;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatornormal
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat GetArea(List<Vector3> points, Vector3 normal)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector3 vector = Vector3.Zero;Di2015NewLine    for (int numPoint = 0; numPoint < points.Count - 1; numPoint++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyPoint point = points[numPoint];Di2015NewLine        MyPoint nextPoint = points[numPoint + 1];Di2015NewLine        vector += Vector3.CrossProduct(point, nextPoint);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (1f / 2f) * Math.Abs(Vector3.DotProduct(vector, normal));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorAdd
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubtract
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorMultiply
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorCrossProduct
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorDotProduct
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorVector3 GetCentroid(List<Vector3> points)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector3 vector = Vector3.Zero;Di2015NewLine    Vector3 normal = Vector3.CrossProduct(points[0], points[1]);  // Gets the normal of the first triangle (it is used to know if the contribution of the triangle is positive or negative)Di2015NewLine    normal = (1f / normal.Length) * normal;  // Makes the vector unitaryDi2015NewLine    float sumProjectedAreas = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int numPoint = 0; numPoint < points.Count - 1; numPoint++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyPoint point = points[numPoint];Di2015NewLine        MyPoint nextPoint = points[numPoint + 1];Di2015NewLine        float triangleProjectedArea = Vector3.DotProduct(Vector3.CrossProduct(point, nextPoint), normal);Di2015NewLine        sumProjectedAreas += triangleProjectedArea;Di2015NewLine        vector += triangleProjectedArea  * (point + nextPoint);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (1f / (6f * sumProjectedAreas)) * vector;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorVector3
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorVector3.Length
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorVector3
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorVector3 GeographicCoordinatesToPoint(float latitude, float longitude)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return EarthRadius * new Vector3(Math.Cos(latitude) * Math.Cos(longitude), Math.Cos(latitude) * Math.Sin(longitude), Math.Sin(latitude));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparator// Converts the latitude/longitude coordinates to 3D coordinatesDi2015NewLineList<Vector3> pointsIn3D = (from point in pointsDi2015NewLine                            select GeographicCoordinatesToPoint(point.Latitude, point.Longitude))Di2015NewLine                           .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Gets the centroid (to have the normal of the vector space)Di2015NewLineVector3 centroid = GetCentroid(pointsIn3D );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// As we are on a sphere, the normal at a given point is the colinear to the vector going from the center of the sphere to the point.Di2015NewLineVector3 normal = (1f / centroid.Length) * centroid;  // We want a unitary normal.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Finally the area is computed using:Di2015NewLinefloat area = GetArea(pointsIn3D, normal);Di2015NewLine
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorVector3
17775964Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct Vector3Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static readonly Vector3 Zero = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public readonly float X;Di2015NewLine    public readonly float Y;Di2015NewLine    public readonly float Z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public float Length { return Math.Sqrt(X * X + Y * Y + Z * Z); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Vector3(float x, float y, float z)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         X = x;Di2015NewLine         Y = y;Di2015NewLine         Z = z;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Vector3 operator +(Vector3 vector1, Vector3 vector2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Vector3(vector1.X + vector2.X, vector1.Y + vector2.Y, vector1.Z + vector2.Z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static Vector3 operator -(Vector3 vector1, Vector3 vector2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Vector3(vector1.X - vector2.X, vector1.Y - vector2.Y, vector1.Z - vector2.Z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static Vector3 operator *(float scalar, Vector3 vector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Vector3(scalar * vector.X, scalar * vector.Y, scalar * vector.Z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static float DotProduct(Vector3 vector1, Vector3 vector2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return vector1.X * vector2.X + vector1.Y * vector2.Y + vector1.Z * vector2.Z;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static Vector3 CrossProduct(Vector3 vector1, Vector3 vector2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return return new Vector3(vector1.Y * vector2.Z - vector1.Z * vector2.Y,Di2015NewLine                                  vector1.Z * vector2.X - vector1.X * vector2.Z,Di2015NewLine                                  vector1.X * vector2.Y - vector1.Y * vector2.X);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17775997Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetPixel()
17775997Di2015UniqueSeparator//Load the bitmapDi2015NewLineBitmap image = (Bitmap)Image.FromFile("image.png"); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Get the bitmap dataDi2015NewLinevar bitmapData = image.LockBits (Di2015NewLine    new Rectangle (0, 0, image.Width, image.Height),Di2015NewLine    ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, Di2015NewLine    image.PixelFormatDi2015NewLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Initialize an array for all the image dataDi2015NewLinebyte[] imageBytes = new byte[bitmapData.Stride * image.Height];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Copy the bitmap data to the local arrayDi2015NewLineMarshal.Copy(bitmapData.Scan0,imageBytes,0,imageBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Unlock the bitmapDi2015NewLineimage.UnlockBits(bitmapData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Find pixelsizeDi2015NewLineint pixelSize = Image.GetPixelFormatSize(image.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// An example on how to use the pixels, lets make a copyDi2015NewLineint x = 0;Di2015NewLineint y = 0;Di2015NewLinevar bitmap = new Bitmap (image.Width, image.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Loop pixelsDi2015NewLinefor(int i=0;i<imageBytes.Length;i+=pixelSize/8)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Copy the bits into a local arrayDi2015NewLine    var pixelData = new byte[3];Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(imageBytes,i,pixelData,0,3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the color of a pixelDi2015NewLine    var color = Color.FromArgb (pixelData [0], pixelData [1], pixelData [2]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Set the color of a pixelDi2015NewLine    bitmap.SetPixel (x,y,color);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Map the 1D array to (x,y)Di2015NewLine    x++;Di2015NewLine    if( x >= 100)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x=0;Di2015NewLine        y++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Save the duplicateDi2015NewLinebitmap.Save ("image_copy.png");Di2015NewLine

17782838Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double angleFromPoint(Point inputPoint, Point centerPoint)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double varX1 = Math.Abs(inputPoint.X - centerPoint.X);Di2015NewLine    double varY1 = Math.Abs(inputPoint.Y - centerPoint.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double outAngle = 180 * Math.Atan(varY1 / varX1) / Math.PI; //Angle from 0 to 90 which has to be updated on account of the quadrant it is in and the chosen systDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int curQuadrant = determineQuadrant(inputPoint, centerPoint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Modifications to account for the default system of referenceDi2015NewLine    if (curQuadrant == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        outAngle = 180 - outAngle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (curQuadrant == 3)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        outAngle = 360 - outAngle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (curQuadrant == 4)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        outAngle = 180 + outAngle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Over-modification to account for the system of reference "Desired", +90 the default system of referenceDi2015NewLine    outAngle = outAngle + 90;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (outAngle > 360)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        outAngle = outAngle - 360;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return outAngle;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Moving clockwisely, the first quadrant is located between 180 and 90 degrees in the default system of reference Di2015NewLinepublic static int determineQuadrant(Point inputPoint, Point centerPoint)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int curQuadrant = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (inputPoint.X < centerPoint.X && inputPoint.Y >= centerPoint.Y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Default system of reference -> 180 to 90Di2015NewLine        curQuadrant = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (inputPoint.X >= centerPoint.X && inputPoint.Y >= centerPoint.Y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Default system of reference -> 90 to 0/360Di2015NewLine        curQuadrant = 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (inputPoint.X >= centerPoint.X && inputPoint.Y < centerPoint.Y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Default system of reference -> 0/360 to 270Di2015NewLine        curQuadrant = 3;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (inputPoint.X < centerPoint.X && inputPoint.Y < centerPoint.Y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Default system of reference -> 270 to 180Di2015NewLine        curQuadrant = 4;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return curQuadrant;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17782838Di2015UniqueSeparatorPoint rotatedPoint = RotatePoint(curPointnew, centerPoint, rotationAngle);Di2015NewLinedouble angleRotatedPoint = angleFromPoint(rotatedPoint, centerPoint);Di2015NewLine

17785115Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Reconstructs the box plot from series dataDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic void ReconstructFromData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int N = SampleValues.Count;Di2015NewLine  if (N > 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    double InvN = 1.0 / N;Di2015NewLine    /* calculate median */Di2015NewLine    int med = N / 2;Di2015NewLine    if ((N % 2) == 0) median = 0.5 * (SampleValues[med - 1] + SampleValues[med]);Di2015NewLine    else median = SampleValues[med];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* calculate Q1 && Q3 */Di2015NewLine            quartile1 = N > 1 ? Percentile(SampleValues, 0.25) : SampleValues[0];Di2015NewLine            quartile3 = N > 1 ? Percentile(SampleValues, 0.75) : SampleValues[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* calculate IQR */Di2015NewLine    double iqr = quartile3 - quartile1;Di2015NewLine    innerFence1 = quartile1 - whiskerLength * iqr;Di2015NewLine    innerFence3 = quartile3 + whiskerLength * iqr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* find adjacent points */Di2015NewLine    int i;Di2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i <= med; i++) if (SampleValues[i] > innerFence1) break;Di2015NewLine    adjacentPoint1 = SampleValues[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i = med; i < N; i++) if (SampleValues[i] > innerFence3) break;Di2015NewLine    adjacentPoint3 = SampleValues[i - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* calculate outer fences */Di2015NewLine    outerFence1 = quartile1 - 2 * whiskerLength * iqr;Di2015NewLine    outerFence3 = quartile3 + 2 * whiskerLength * iqr;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17785115Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (i = med; i < N; i++) if (SampleValues[i] > innerFence3) break;Di2015NewLineadjacentPoint3 = SampleValues[i - 1];Di2015NewLine

17786059Di2015UniqueSeparatorTransformBlock
17786059Di2015UniqueSeparator        static void Hash2Md5inParallel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string strFullPath = YourFilePathGoesHere;Di2015NewLine        byte[] Buffer = new Byte[1000]; //Instantiate Buffer to copy bytes.Di2015NewLine        byte[] DumpBuffer = new Byte[1000];  //Send output to bin.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Security.Cryptography.MD5 md5_1 = new System.Security.Cryptography.MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        System.Security.Cryptography.MD5 md5_2 = new System.Security.Cryptography.MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.IO.FileStream file = new System.IO.FileStream(strFullPath, FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine        file.Seek(1000, SeekOrigin.Begin);    //skip some chars if need beDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int BytesToHash = 0;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BytesToHash = file.Read(Buffer, 0, 1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            md5_1.TransformBlock(Buffer, 0, BytesToHash, DumpBuffer, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //enter some code to skip some bytes for the other hash if you like...Di2015NewLine            md5_2.TransformBlock(Buffer, 0, BytesToHash, DumpBuffer, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (BytesToHash > 0); //Repeat until no more bytes.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //call TransformFinalBlock to finish hashing - empty block is enoughDi2015NewLine        md5_1.TransformFinalBlock(new byte[0], 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        md5_2.TransformFinalBlock(new byte[0], 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get both Hashs.Di2015NewLine        byte[] hash1 = md5_1.Hash;Di2015NewLine        byte[] hash2 = md5_2.Hash;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17789779Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime date = DateTime.Parse("July 22, 2013");Di2015NewLine        DayOfWeek dateDay = date.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine        DayOfWeek[] possibleDays = { DayOfWeek.Tuesday,DayOfWeek.Wednesday,DayOfWeek.Friday };Di2015NewLine        int addToBestAnswer = 7;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var checkDay in possibleDays)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (checkDay-dateDay<addToBestAnswer)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                addToBestAnswer = checkDay - dateDay;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        DateTime Answer = date.AddDays(addToBestAnswer);Di2015NewLine
17789779Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime date = DateTime.Parse("July 22, 2013");Di2015NewLine        string[] possibleDays={ "Tuesday","Wednesday","Friday" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<int> pDays = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var inputDay in possibleDays)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pDays.Add(int.Parse(inputDay.Replace("Sunday", "0").Replace("Monday", "1").Replace("Tuesday", "2").Replace("Wednesday", "3").Replace("Thursday", "4").Replace("Friday", "5").Replace("Saturday", "6")));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int dateDay = (int)date.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int addToBestAnswer = 7;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var checkDay in pDays)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int difference = checkDay - dateDay;Di2015NewLine            if (difference<0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                difference = 7 + difference;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (difference<addToBestAnswer&&difference!=0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                addToBestAnswer = difference;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        DateTime Answer = date.AddDays(addToBestAnswer);Di2015NewLine        // Answer.ToShortDateString()+" ("+Answer.DayOfWeek.ToString()+")";Di2015NewLine

17796829Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // ... Your codeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyResolve += AssemblyResolve;  // Called when the assembly hasn't been successfully resolvedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ... Your codeDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Assembly AssemblyResolve(object sender, ResolveEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Assembly assembly = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string assemblyName = args.Name.Split(',')[0];  // Gets the assembly name to resolve.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Stream stream = assembly.GetManifestResourceStream("MyAssembly.MyDlls." + assemblyName + ".dll"))  // Gets the assembly in the embedded resourcesDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (stream == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] rawAssembly = new byte[stream.Length];Di2015NewLine            stream.Read(rawAssembly, 0, (int)stream.Length); Di2015NewLine            return Assembly.Load(rawAssembly);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17797666Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DisplayModeConfigDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void RegisterDisplayModes(DisplayModeProvider provider)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // INFO: Allows to name views/partials/masters like viewname.iphone.cshtml, and MVC will choose this automaticallyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // INFO: Lets remove the default "Mobile" mode, since it's pretty uselessDi2015NewLine        var mobileDefault = DisplayModeProvider.Instance.Modes.First(m => m.DisplayModeId == "Mobile");Di2015NewLine        if (mobileDefault != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DisplayModeProvider.Instance.Modes.Remove(mobileDefault);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // INFO: Now add one that actually worksDi2015NewLine        provider.Modes.Insert(0,Di2015NewLine            new DefaultDisplayMode("Mobile")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ContextCondition = (context => (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.GetOverriddenUserAgent()) && Regex.IsMatch(context.GetOverriddenUserAgent(), @"mobile|android|kindle|silk|midp", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.CultureInvariant)))Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // INFO: Order from least to most important (since we insert at position 0)Di2015NewLine        provider.Modes.Insert(1,Di2015NewLine            new DefaultDisplayMode("Win8")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ContextCondition = (context => (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.GetOverriddenUserAgent()) && context.GetOverriddenUserAgent().IndexOf("Windows NT 6.2", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) >= 0))Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17799153Di2015UniqueSeparatorKeyDown
17799153Di2015UniqueSeparatorKeyInterop.VirtualKeyFromKey()
17799153Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void TextBox_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ch = (char)KeyInterop.VirtualKeyFromKey(e.Key);Di2015NewLine    if (!char.IsLetter(ch)) { return; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool upper = false;Di2015NewLine    if (Keyboard.IsKeyToggled(Key.Capital) || Keyboard.IsKeyToggled(Key.CapsLock))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        upper = !upper;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (Keyboard.IsKeyDown(Key.LeftShift) || Keyboard.IsKeyDown(Key.RightShift))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        upper = !upper;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!upper)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ch = char.ToLower(ch);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var box = (sender as TextBox);Di2015NewLine    var text = box.Text;Di2015NewLine    var caret = box.CaretIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //string urdu = AsciiToUrdu(e.Key);Di2015NewLine    string urdu = AsciiToUrdu(ch);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Update the TextBox' text..Di2015NewLine    box.Text = text.Insert(caret, urdu);Di2015NewLine    //..move the caret accordingly..Di2015NewLine    box.CaretIndex = caret + urdu.Length;Di2015NewLine    //..and make sure the keystroke isn't handled again by the TextBox itself:Di2015NewLine    e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17804038Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupBySequence<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var iterator = source.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    List<T> group = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (predicate(iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            group.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (group.Any())Di2015NewLine        {                    Di2015NewLine            yield return group;Di2015NewLine            group = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (group.Any())Di2015NewLine        yield return group;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17804481Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<byte> b = new List<byte>() { 50, 60, 70, 80, 90, 10, 20, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 50, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };Di2015NewLine        List<byte> b2 = new List<byte>() { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };Di2015NewLine        SmartComparer comparer = new SmartComparer();Di2015NewLine        //Setting the depth here, now the depth is = 5Di2015NewLine        var result = comparer.CompareArraysWithDepth(b, b2, 5);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var keyValuePair in result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(String.Format("b[{0}]->b[{1}] are equal to b2[{2}]->b2[{3}]", keyValuePair.Key.Key,Di2015NewLine                                            keyValuePair.Key.Value, keyValuePair.Value.Key, keyValuePair.Value.Value));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SmartComparerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Boolean CompareRange(List<byte> a, List<byte> b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < a.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (a[i] != b[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// |Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="a"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="b"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="depth"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Key->range in 'a', Value->range in 'b'</returns>Di2015NewLine    public List<KeyValuePair<KeyValuePair<int, int>, KeyValuePair<int, int>>> CompareArraysWithDepth(Di2015NewLine        List<byte> a, List<byte> b, int depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<KeyValuePair<KeyValuePair<int, int>, KeyValuePair<int, int>>>();Di2015NewLine        if (depth > b.Count)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Array 'b' item count should be more then depth");Di2015NewLine        if(a.Count<b.Count)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Array 'a' item count should be more then Array 'b' item count");Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= a.Count - depth; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j <= b.Count - depth; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (CompareRange(a.GetRange(i, depth), b.GetRange(j, depth)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(new KeyValuePair<KeyValuePair<int, int>, KeyValuePair<int, int>>(new KeyValuePair<int, int>(i, i + depth-1), new KeyValuePair<int, int>(j, j + depth-1)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SendDataToClient()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock   {Di2015NewLine                    string data = dataQueueB.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    // Your process of sending the data goes hereDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Interlocked.Increment(ref counter) == 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                counter = 0;Di2015NewLine                SwapQueues();Di2015NewLine                swappedWh.Set();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                swappedWh.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void SwapQueues()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Wait until both threads are "done" before swappingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (lockerA)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (lockerB)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17807631Di2015UniqueSeparator   /**Di2015NewLine   * Converts the data into CSV in order to download a fileDi2015NewLine   */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  downloadCSV: function(){Di2015NewLine    var i, csv = '',Di2015NewLine        series = this.series,Di2015NewLine        options = this.options,Di2015NewLine        dg = this.loadDataGrid(),Di2015NewLine        separator = encodeURIComponent(options.spreadsheet.csvFileSeparator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (options.spreadsheet.decimalSeparator === options.spreadsheet.csvFileSeparator) {Di2015NewLine      throw "The decimal separator is the same as the column separator ("+options.spreadsheet.decimalSeparator+")";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The first rowDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < series.length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine      csv += separator+'"'+(series[i].label || String.fromCharCode(65+i)).replace(/\\"/g, '\\\\"')+'"';Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    csv += "%0D%0A"; // \\r\\nDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For each rowDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < dg.length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine      var rowLabel = '';Di2015NewLine      // The first columnDi2015NewLine      if (options.xaxis.ticks) {Di2015NewLine        var tick = options.xaxis.ticks.find(function(x){return x[0] == dg[i][0]});Di2015NewLine        if (tick) rowLabel = tick[1];Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      else if (options.spreadsheet.tickFormatter){Di2015NewLine        rowLabel = options.spreadsheet.tickFormatter(dg[i][0]);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      else {Di2015NewLine        rowLabel = options.xaxis.tickFormatter(dg[i][0]);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      rowLabel = '"'+(rowLabel+'').replace(/\\"/g, '\\\\"')+'"';Di2015NewLine      var numbers = dg[i].slice(1).join(separator);Di2015NewLine      if (options.spreadsheet.decimalSeparator !== '.') {Di2015NewLine        numbers = numbers.replace(/\\./g, options.spreadsheet.decimalSeparator);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      csv += rowLabel+separator+numbers+"%0D%0A"; // \\t and \\r\\nDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (Prototype.Browser.IE && !Flotr.isIE9) {Di2015NewLine      csv = csv.replace(new RegExp(separator, 'g'), decodeURIComponent(separator)).replace(/%0A/g, '\\n').replace(/%0D/g, '\\r');Di2015NewLine      window.open().document.write(csv);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else window.open('data:text/csv,'+csv);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

17807797Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomViewEngine : RazorViewEngineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override IView CreatePartialView(ControllerContext controllerContext, string partialPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var view = base.CreatePartialView(controllerContext, partialPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ViewWrapper(view);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override IView CreateView(ControllerContext controllerContext, string viewPath, string masterPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var view = base.CreateView(controllerContext, viewPath, masterPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ViewWrapper(view);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ViewWrapper : IViewDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected IView View;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ViewWrapper(IView view)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        View = view;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Render(ViewContext viewContext, TextWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Type modelType = BuildManager.GetCompiledType(razorView.ViewPath);Di2015NewLine        var razorView = View as RazorView;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (razorView != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //if we could not get the model object - try to get it from what is declared in viewDi2015NewLine            var compiledViewType = BuildManager.GetCompiledType(razorView.ViewPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var model = viewContext.ViewData.Model;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type baseType = compiledViewType.BaseType;Di2015NewLine            //model is passed as generic parameter, like this MyView1 : WebViewPage<MyModel1>Di2015NewLine            if (baseType != null && baseType.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //and here the trick begins - extract type of model from generic argumentsDi2015NewLine                var modelType = baseType.GetGenericArguments()[0]; //the same as typeof(MyModel1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // ReSharper disable UseMethodIsInstanceOfTypeDi2015NewLine                //If model is null, or model is not type of the given model (for partials)Di2015NewLine                if (model == null || !modelType.IsAssignableFrom(model.GetType()))Di2015NewLine                // ReSharper restore UseMethodIsInstanceOfTypeDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Set @model and render the viewDi2015NewLine                    viewContext.ViewData.Model = Activator.CreateInstance(modelType);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        View.Render(viewContext, writer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
