17808712Di2015UniqueSeparatorDwmSetColorizationParameters
17808712Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DwmManagerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   private struct DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMSDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      public uint clrColor;Di2015NewLine      public uint clrAfterGlow;Di2015NewLine      public uint nIntensity;Di2015NewLine      public uint clrAfterGlowBalance;Di2015NewLine      public uint clrBlurBalance;Di2015NewLine      public uint clrGlassReflectionIntensity;Di2015NewLine      public bool fOpaque;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   [DllImport("dwmapi.dll", EntryPoint = "#127", PreserveSig = false)]Di2015NewLine   private static extern void DwmGetColorizationParameters(out DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   [DllImport("dwmapi.dll", EntryPoint = "#131", PreserveSig = false)]Di2015NewLine   private static extern void DwmSetColorizationParameters(ref DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS parameters,Di2015NewLine                                                           bool unknown);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Helper method to convert from a Win32 BGRA-format color to a .NET color.Di2015NewLine   private static Color BgraToColor(uint color)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return Color.FromArgb(Int32.Parse(color.ToString("X"), NumberStyles.HexNumber));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Helper method to convert from a .NET color to a Win32 BGRA-format color.Di2015NewLine   private static uint ColorToBgra(Color color)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return (uint)(color.B | (color.G << 8) | (color.R << 16) | (color.A << 24));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Gets or sets the current color used for DWM glass, based on the user's color scheme.Di2015NewLine   public static Color ColorizationColorDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // Call the DwmGetColorizationParameters function to fill in our structure.Di2015NewLine         DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS parameters;Di2015NewLine         DwmGetColorizationParameters(out parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Convert the colorization color to a .NET color and return it.Di2015NewLine         return BgraToColor(parameters.clrColor);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      setDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // Retrieve the current colorization parameters, just like we did above.Di2015NewLine         DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS parameters;Di2015NewLine         DwmGetColorizationParameters(out parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Then modify the colorization color.Di2015NewLine         // Note that the other parameters are left untouched, so they will stay the same.Di2015NewLine         // You can also modify these; that is left as an exercise.Di2015NewLine         parameters.clrColor = ColorToBgra(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Call the DwmSetColorizationParameters to make the change take effect.Di2015NewLine         DwmSetColorizationParameters(ref parameters, false);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

};Di2015NewLine            focusWatcher.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IInputElement getCurrentFocus()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IInputElement        Monitor.Exit(focusWatcher);Di2015NewLine                }));Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Wait(focusWatcher);Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Exit(focusWatcher);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!isDisposed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine 17812884Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Process(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    input = input.Trim();                                          // Removes all leading and trailing white-space characters Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char lastChar = input[input.Length - 1];                       // Gets the last character of the inputDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (char.IsDigit(lastChar))                                    // If the last character is a digitDi2015NewLine        return int.Parse(input, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);     // Returns the converted input, using an independent culture (easy ;)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int number = int.Parse(input.Substring(0, input.Length - 1),   // Gets the number represented by the input (except the last character)Di2015NewLine                           CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);          // Using an independent cultureDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (lastChar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 's':Di2015NewLine            return number;Di2015NewLine        case 'm':Di2015NewLine            return number * 60;Di2015NewLine        case 'h':Di2015NewLine            return number * 60 * 60;Di2015NewLine        case 'd':Di2015NewLine            return number * 24 * 60 * 60;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid argument format.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17814434Di2015UniqueSeparator    public IEnumerable<IPageNode> ancestorsOf(IPageNode pageNode) {Di2015NewLine        if(pageNode == null) throw new ArgumentNullException(("pageNode"));Di2015NewLine        Stack<IPageNode> stack = new Stack<IPageNode>();Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(pageNode);Di2015NewLine        while(stack.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IPageNode n=stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            if (n.url != pageNodeService.rootUrl) {Di2015NewLine                yield return n;Di2015NewLine                if(n.parent != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    stack.Push(n.parent);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17814817Di2015UniqueSeparator// An interface which implements IDbSet<T> and adds on the method you wantDi2015NewLinepublic interface IExtendedDbSet<T> : IDbSet<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DbSqlQuery<T> SqlQuery(string sql, object[] parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Implement this interface by wrapping around a regular DbSet<T>.Di2015NewLine// You implement all the methods and properties by just wrapping the DbSet<T>Di2015NewLine// callsDi2015NewLinepublic class ExtendedDbSet<T> : IExtendedDbSet<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly DbSet<T> _dbSet;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ExtendedDbSet(DbSet<T> dbSet) { _dbSet = dbSet; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DbSqlQuery<T> IExtendedDbSet<T>.SqlQuery(string sql, object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _dbSet.SqlQuery(sql, parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T IDbSet<T>.Add(T entity) { return _dbSet.Add(entity); }Di2015NewLine    T IDbSet<T>.Attach(T entity) { return _dbSet.Attach(entity); }Di2015NewLine    TDerivedEntity IDbSet<T>.Create<TDerivedEntity>() { return _dbSet.Create<TDerivedEntity>(); }Di2015NewLine    T IDbSet<T>.Create() { return _dbSet.Create(); }Di2015NewLine    T IDbSet<T>.Find(params object[] keyValues) { return _dbSet.Find(keyValues); }Di2015NewLine    ObservableCollection<T> IDbSet<T>.Local { get { return _dbSet.Local; } }Di2015NewLine    T IDbSet<T>.Remove(T entity) { return _dbSet.Remove(entity); }Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator<T> IEnumerable<T>.GetEnumerator() { return ((IEnumerable<T>)_dbSet).GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return ((IEnumerable)_dbSet).GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine    Type IQueryable.ElementType { get { return ((IQueryable)_dbSet).ElementType; } }Di2015NewLine    Expression IQueryable.Expression { get { return ((IQueryable)_dbSet).Expression; } }Di2015NewLine    IQueryProvider IQueryable.Provider { get { return ((IQueryable)_dbSet).Provider; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// A regular context class, no special interfaces to implement orDi2015NewLine// custom properties or anything.Di2015NewLinepublic class MyContext : DbContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DbSet<Car> Cars { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// An interface representing your context, which exposes extended DbSet<T>Di2015NewLine// for your sets. Also define SaveChanges() and whatever else you may needDi2015NewLine// to call on your context object.Di2015NewLinepublic interface IMyContextDi2015NewLine    : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IExtendedDbSet<Car> Cars { get; }Di2015NewLine    int SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// A wrapper around your regular context. For each set, return anDi2015NewLine// ExtendedDbSet<T> wrapper.Di2015NewLinepublic class MyContextWrapper : IMyContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly MyContext _myContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyContextWrapper(MyContext myContext) { _myContext = myContext; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IExtendedDbSet<Car> IMyContext.CarsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return new ExtendedDbSet<Car>(_myContext.Cars); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IDisposable.Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _myContext.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int IMyContext.SaveChanges()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _myContext.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define your context variable as IMyContext, and create itDi2015NewLine// by creating a wrapper around a regular context. The propertiesDi2015NewLine// of the interface will be extended wrappers around your sets.Di2015NewLineinternal class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IMyContext context = new MyContextWrapper(new MyContext()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(context.Cars.SqlQuery("select 1", new object[0]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17815157Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, string> conditions = new Dictionary<string, string> { { "name", "John" } };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineXDocument document = XDocument.Load(new StringReader(xmlString));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar booms = from boomElement in document.Descendants("boom")Di2015NewLine            where conditions.All(condition => (string)boomElement.Element(condition.Key) == condition.Value)  // Where is used to filter the resultDi2015NewLine            let boomChildren = (from boomElementChild in boomElement.Elements()Di2015NewLine                                select String.Format("{0}: {1}",Di2015NewLine                                                     boomElementChild.Name.LocalName,Di2015NewLine                                                     boomElementChild.Value))Di2015NewLine            select String.Join(Environment.NewLine, boomChildren);Di2015NewLinevar result = String.Join(Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine, booms);Di2015NewLine
17815157Di2015UniqueSeparator// I've made Condition an abstract class to super any kind of condition.Di2015NewLine// Just derive this class with the condition you want (And, Or, Equal, <=, IsNumber, ...)Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class ConditionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // A condition is defined by this method. Because a condition is basically: "Does the specified value satisfy the condition?"Di2015NewLine    public abstract bool Satisfy(string valueToTest);  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is the first example of condition.Di2015NewLine// I wanted to make the condition immutable (readonly) not to be able to change them.Di2015NewLine// So, all parameters of the condition are set during the construction.Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class EqualCondition : ConditionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string value;Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get { return value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public EqualCondition(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Satisfy(string valueToTest)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value == valueToTest;  // Equals condition...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class ContainCondition : ConditionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string value;Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get { return value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ContainCondition(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Satisfy(string valueToTest)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return valueToTest.Contains(valueToTest);  // Contains conditionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The dictionary is used to list the conditions applied to each element.Di2015NewLineDictionary<string, Condition> conditions = new Dictionary<string, Condition> { { "name", new EqualCondition("John") } };  Di2015NewLineXDocument document = XDocument.Load("test.xml");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar booms = from boomElement in document.Descendants("boom")Di2015NewLine            // The next line check where all conditions are satisfied for the corresponding elementsDi2015NewLine            where conditions.All(condition => condition.Value.Satisfy((string)boomElement.Element(condition.Key)))Di2015NewLine            let boomChildren = (from boomElementChild in boomElement.Elements()Di2015NewLine                                select String.Format("{0}: {1}",Di2015NewLine                                                        boomElementChild.Name.LocalName,Di2015NewLine                                                        boomElementChild.Value))Di2015NewLine            select String.Join(Environment.NewLine, boomChildren);Di2015NewLinevar result = String.Join(Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine, booms);Di2015NewLine

17815269Di2015UniqueSeparator(\\([^)]*?)(<replaced>(?:, <replaced>)*)([^)]*\\))Di2015NewLine

17816491Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar myUrl = "http://www.stackoverflow.com";Di2015NewLinevar encoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineXmlWriterSettings settings = new XmlWriterSettings();Di2015NewLinesettings.Indent = true;Di2015NewLinesettings.Encoding = encoding;Di2015NewLinevar SOME_MAX_SIZE_IN_BYTES = 1024;Di2015NewLineMemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLinefor(var i=0; i<10; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(ms, settings))Di2015NewLine    {    Di2015NewLine        // CREATE XML WITH STATEMENTS LIKE THISDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartElement("url", myUrl);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine        // in order to get a semi-accurate byte count, Di2015NewLine        // you need to force the flush to the underlying streamDi2015NewLine        writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine        var lengthInBytes = ms.Length;Di2015NewLine        if(lengthInBytes > SOME_MAX_SIZE_IN_BYTES)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("TOO BIG!");Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar xml = encoding.GetString(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(xml);Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        //New tasks are provided by the file system monitor.Di2015NewLine        myCopyTask newTask = new myCopyTask();Di2015NewLine        newTask.sourcePath = "...";Di2015NewLine       queue.Enqueue(newTask);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Keep in mind that Timer is touched from different threads.Di2015NewLine        lock (retryTimeout)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            retryTimeout.Change(1000, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Start this routine only via Timer.Di2015NewLine    private void QueueProcess(object iTimeoutState)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myCopyTask task = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Keep in mind that queue is touched from different threads.Di2015NewLine            lock (queue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    task = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (task != null)Di2015NewLine CopyTaskProcess(myCopyTask task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileStream sourceStream = null;Di2015NewLine        FileStream destStream = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine retries. Keep in mind that this approachDi2015NewLine            //delays worker thread that is implicitly involved by await keyword.Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Keep in mind that queue is touched from different threads.Di2015NewLine            lock (queue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(task);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Keep in mind that Timer is touched from different threads.Di2015NewLine            lock (retryTimeout)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                retryTimeout.Change(1000, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sourceStream != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sourceStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (destStream != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                destStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class myCopyTaskDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string sourcePath;Di2015NewLine    public string destinationPath;Di2015NewLine    public long retryCount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17819169Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult Edit(int id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Load the subscription with the requested id from the DBDi2015NewLine    // together with its current related companies (only their Ids)Di2015NewLine    var data = _context.SubscriptionsDi2015NewLine        .Where(s => s.SubscriptionId == id)Di2015NewLine        .Select(s => newDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ViewModel = new SubscriptionEditViewModelDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Id = s.SubscriptionIdDi2015NewLine                Amount = s.AmountDi2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            CompanyIds = s.Companies.Select(c => c.CompanyId)Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (data == null)Di2015NewLine        return HttpNotFound();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load all companies from the DBDi2015NewLine    data.ViewModel.Companies = _context.CompaniesDi2015NewLine        .Select(c => new CompanySelectViewModelDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CompanyId = c.CompanyId,Di2015NewLine            Name = c.NameDi2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set IsSelected flag: true (= checkbox checked) if the companyDi2015NewLine    // is already related with the subscription; false, if notDi2015NewLine    foreach (var c in data.ViewModel.Companies)Di2015NewLine        c.IsSelected = data.CompanyIds.Contains(c.CompanyId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return View(data.ViewModel);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17819169Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpPost]Di2015NewLinepublic ActionResult Edit(SubscriptionEditViewModel viewModel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ModelState.IsValid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine _context.Companies.Attach(addedCompany);Di2015NewLine                        subscription.Companies.Add(addedCompany);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var removedCompany = subscription.CompaniesDi2015NewLine                       .SingleOrDefault(c => c.CompanyId == company.CompanyId);Di2015NewLine                    if (removedCompany != null)Di2015NewLine                        // if company is not selected but currentlyDi2015NewLine                        // related in DB, remove relationshipDi2015NewLine                        subscription.Companies.Remove(removedCompany);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return RedirectToAction("Index");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return View(viewModel);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17819624Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult DisplayCardsResults(int _page, string _sortOrder, string _filter = "", string _searchValue = "")Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ViewBag._filter = _filter;Di2015NewLine  ViewBag._searchValue= _searchValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //Do whatever you are doing to get the cards but to the resultant collection add the following where condition, suppose the collection is in var cardsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine switch (_filter)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case "cardRarity":Di2015NewLine                    cards = cards.Where(s => s.CardRarity == _searchValue);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case "cardType":Di2015NewLine                    cards = cards.Where(s => s.CardType == _searchValue);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case "cardColor":Di2015NewLine                    cards = cards.Where(s => s.CardColor == _searchValue);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    // no filterDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine   if(Request.isAjaxRequest)Di2015NewLine      return PartialView("_ResultsTable",cards);Di2015NewLine  return View(cards);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17820254Di2015UniqueSeparator/*Di2015NewLineGetIocpQueueCountDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDescription:Di2015NewLineReturns the number of queued IOCP work and I/O completion items.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRemarks:Di2015NewLineMicrosoft declined to implement the NtQueryIoCompletion routineDi2015NewLinefor user mode. This function gets past that omission by callingDi2015NewLinethe NTDLL.DLL function dynamically.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineReturns:Di2015NewLineNumber of items in the queue at the instant this function wasDi2015NewLinecalled, or -1 if an error occurred. Errors can be retrievedDi2015NewLineby calling GetLastError.Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLinelong GetIocpQueueCount()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   long lQueueDepth = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   typedef DWORD (WINAPI *LPFNNTQUERYIOCOMPLETION)(HANDLE, int, PVOID, ULONG, PULONG);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   static LPFNNTQUERYIOCOMPLETION pfnNtQueryIoCompletion = NULL;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (MFTASKQUEUENOTCREATED != m_dwStatus)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      DWORD rc = NO_ERROR;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      /* need to load dynamically */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (NULL == pfnNtQueryIoCompletion)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         /* Now dynamically obtain the undocumented NtQueryIoCompletionDi2015NewLine          * entry point from NTDLL.DLLDi2015NewLine          */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         HMODULE hmodDll = ::GetModuleHandleW(L"ntdll.dll");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // NTDLL is always loaded, just get its handleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (NULL != hmodDll)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            pfnNtQueryIoCompletion = (LPFNNTQUERYIOCOMPLETION)::GetProcAddress(Di2015NewLine               hmodDll,Di2015NewLine               "NtQueryIoCompletion"); // NB: ANSIDi2015NewLine         } Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (NULL != pfnNtQueryIoCompletion)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         rc = (pfnNtQueryIoCompletion)(Di2015NewLine            m_hIOCP,Di2015NewLine            0,Di2015NewLine            (PVOID)&lQueueDepth,Di2015NewLine            sizeof(lQueueDepth),Di2015NewLine            NULL);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         rc = ERROR_NOT_FOUND;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      ::SetLastError(rc);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return lQueueDepth;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17820555Di2015UniqueSeparatorArray.CreateInstance(Type, Int32[])
17820555Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Array CreateArray(Array array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Gets the lengths and lower bounds of the input arrayDi2015NewLine    int[] lowerBounds = new int[array.Rank];Di2015NewLine    int[] lengths = new int[array.Rank];Di2015NewLine    for (int numDimension = 0; numDimension < array.Rank; numDimension++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lowerBounds[numDimension] = array.GetLowerBound(numDimension);Di2015NewLine        lengths[numDimension] = array.GetLength(numDimension);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type elementType = array.GetType().GetElementType();  // Gets the type of the elements in the input arrayDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Array.CreateInstance(elementType, lengths, lowerBounds);    // Returns the new arrayDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17820555Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int size = 10000000;Di2015NewLineobject[] array1 = new object[size];Di2015NewLineobject[] array2 = new object[size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRandom random;Di2015NewLinerandom = new Random(0);Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    array1[i] = random.Next();Di2015NewLine    array2[i] = random.Next();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStopwatch stopwatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.ReadKey();Di2015NewLinestopwatch.Restart();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine    array1[i] = array2[i];Di2015NewLinestopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Indexer method: {0}", stopwatch.Elapsed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinerandom = new Random(0);Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    array1[i] = random.Next();Di2015NewLine    array2[i] = random.Next();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.ReadKey();Di2015NewLinestopwatch.Restart();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine    array1.SetValue(array2.GetValue(i), i);Di2015NewLinestopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Get/SetValue method: {0}", stopwatch.Elapsed);Di2015NewLine

17824829Di2015UniqueSeparator// Build a javascript array with all of the select names/valuesDi2015NewLinevar options = new Array();Di2015NewLine$('#Questions1 option').each(function() {Di2015NewLine    $this = $(this);Di2015NewLine    options.push({ Name: $this.text(), Value: $this.val() });Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a function for re-building a select minus the chosen optionDi2015NewLinevar rebuildSelect = function($selOption, $select) {Di2015NewLine    $previouslySelected = $select.find(':selected');Di2015NewLine    $select.empty();Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        var opt = options[i];Di2015NewLine        if (opt.Value != $selOption.val()) {Di2015NewLine            if ($previouslySelected.val() == opt.Value) {Di2015NewLine                $select.append('<option value="' + opt.Value + '" selected="selected">' + opt.Name + '</option>');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                $select.append('<option value="' + opt.Value + '">' + opt.Name + '</option>');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Wire up the event handlersDi2015NewLinevar $Questions1 = $('#Questions1');Di2015NewLinevar $Questions2 = $('#Questions2');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$Questions1.change(function() {Di2015NewLine    rebuildSelect($(this), $Questions2);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$Questions2.change(function() {Di2015NewLine    rebuildSelect($(this), $Questions1);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Go ahead and run the function on each box to remove the default entries from the other boxDi2015NewLinerebuildSelect($Questions1.find(':selected'), $Questions2);Di2015NewLinerebuildSelect($Questions2.find(':selected'), $Questions1);Di2015NewLine

17831608Di2015UniqueSeparator // set up a subjectDi2015NewLine Subject<Unit> heartbeatSubject=new Subject<Unit>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // set up the heartbeataction to push units down the subjectDi2015NewLine Action sendHeartbeat = () => { heartbeatSubject.OnNext(Unit.Default); };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // use the heartbeat subject somehow.Di2015NewLine heartbeatSubject.Subscribe(_=>Console.WriteLine("Operation produced a heartbeat"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // start the operationDi2015NewLine operation(sendHeartbeat);Di2015NewLine

17832241Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Texts(FileInfo srcFile, DirectoryInfo outDir, string splitter = "dipendent")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // open file readerDi2015NewLine        using (StreamReader srcRdr = new StreamReader(srcFile.FullName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int outFileIdx = 1;Di2015NewLine            StreamWriter outWriter = new StreamWriter(outDir.FullName + srcFile.Name + outFileIdx + ".txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (!srcRdr.EndOfStream)  //  read lines one by one untill endsDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string readLine = srcRdr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                int indexOfSplitter = readLine.IndexOf(splitter, StringComparison.Ordinal); // find splitterDi2015NewLine                if(indexOfSplitter >= 0) // if there is a splitterDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    outWriter.WriteLine(readLine.Substring(indexOfSplitter)); // write whats before...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //outWriter.WriteLine(readLine.Substring(indexOfSplitter) + splitter.Length); // use if you want splitting text to apear in the end of the previous fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    outWriter.Close(); // close the current fileDi2015NewLine                    outWriter.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // update the Text to be written to exclude what's already written to the current filsDi2015NewLine                    readLine = readLine.Substring(indexOfSplitter); Di2015NewLine                    //readLine = readLine.Substring(indexOfSplitter + splitter.Length);  // Use if you want splitting text to apear in the new fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // OPEN NEXT FILEDi2015NewLine                    outFileIdx++; Di2015NewLine                    outWriter = new StreamWriter(outDir.FullName + srcFile.Name + outFileIdx + ".txt");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                outWriter.WriteLine(readLine);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            outWriter.Close();Di2015NewLine            outWriter.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17832790Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Diff(Di2015NewLine    string sourcePath,Di2015NewLine    string targetPath,Di2015NewLine    string patchPath,Di2015NewLine    string addedSuffix,Di2015NewLine    string removedSuffix)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(var sourceReader = new StreamReader(sourcePath))Di2015NewLine    using(var targetReader = new StreamReader(targetPath))Di2015NewLine    using(var patchWriter = new StreamWriter(patchPath, append:false))Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        var sourceLine = sourceReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        var targetLine = targetReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var added = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLine        var removed = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        do{Di2015NewLine            if(sourceLine == targetLine)Di2015NewLine            {   Di2015NewLine                sourceLine = sourceReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                targetLine = targetReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(removed.Contains(targetLine))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Found targetLine in tentatively removed lines, so it wasn't actually removed.Di2015NewLine                    removed.Remove(targetLine);Di2015NewLine                    // Since we found something we thought had been removed, we know that all tentatively added lines actually are new.Di2015NewLine                    Flush(patchWriter, added, addedSuffix);             Di2015NewLine                    added.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    targetLine = targetReader.ReadLine();               Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine                else if(added.Contains(sourceLine))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Found sourceLine in tentatively added lines, so it wasn't actually added.Di2015NewLine                    added.Remove(sourceLine);Di2015NewLine                    // We found something we thought had been added, so all candidates for removal should actually be removed.Di2015NewLine                    Flush(patchWriter,removed, removedSuffix);Di2015NewLine                    removed.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sourceLine = sourceReader.ReadLine();               Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Source and target don't match, so we assume that the source was removed and the target was added.Di2015NewLine                    // If we're wrong, we'll clean it up when we come across the line later on.Di2015NewLine                    removed.Add(sourceLine);Di2015NewLine                    added.Add(targetLine);Di2015NewLine                    sourceLine = sourceReader.ReadLine();               Di2015NewLine                    targetLine = targetReader.ReadLine();               Di2015NewLine                }       Di2015NewLine            }   Di2015NewLine        } while(sourceLine != null || targetLine != null); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Flush(patchWriter, added, addedSuffix);Di2015NewLine        Flush(patchWriter, removed, removedSuffix);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Flush(StreamWriter writer, IEnumerable<string> lines, string suffix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var line in lines.Where (l => l != null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine("{0} {1}", line.Trim(), suffix);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17832790Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar path = /* path */;Di2015NewLinevar sourcePath = Path.Combine(path, "source.txt");Di2015NewLinevar targetPath = Path.Combine(path, "target.txt");Di2015NewLinevar expectedPath = Path.Combine(path, "expected.txt");Di2015NewLinevar rnd = new Random(10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing(var sourceWriter = new StreamWriter(sourcePath))Di2015NewLineusing(var targetWriter = new StreamWriter(targetPath))Di2015NewLineusing(var expectedWriter = new StreamWriter(expectedPath))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var limit = 10.0 * 100000;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < limit; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(i % 10000 == 0) Console.Write("{0:P0} ...", i / limit);Di2015NewLine        var guid = Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLine        var r = rnd.Next(0,10);Di2015NewLine        var removed = 3;Di2015NewLine        var added = 6;Di2015NewLine        if(r >= 0 && r < removed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sourceWriter.WriteLine(guid);Di2015NewLine            expectedWriter.WriteLine(guid + " 0");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if(r >= removed && r < added)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            targetWriter.WriteLine(guid);Di2015NewLine            expectedWriter.WriteLine(guid + " 1");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if(r >= added)Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            sourceWriter.WriteLine(guid);Di2015NewLine            targetWriter.WriteLine(guid);           Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17834314Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // creates a clause like Di2015NewLine   // select * from Menu where MenuText like '%ASD%' or ActionName like '%ASD%' or....Di2015NewLine    var items = Menu.Filter("ASD").ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLinepublic static class QueryExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> Filter<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, string search)    Di2015NewLine    {           Di2015NewLine        var properties = typeof(T).GetProperties().Where(p => Di2015NewLine                /*p.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute),true).Any() && */Di2015NewLine                p.PropertyType == typeof(String));        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var predicate = PredicateBuilder.False<T>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           predicate = predicate.Or(CreateLike<T>(property,search));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return query.AsExpandable().Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static Expression<Func<T,bool>> CreateLike<T>( PropertyInfo prop, string value)Di2015NewLine    {       Di2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "f");Di2015NewLine        var propertyAccess = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, prop);                    Di2015NewLine        var like = Expression.Call(propertyAccess, "Contains", null, Expression.Constant(value,typeof(string)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(like, parameter);       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

"+" : "-",Di2015NewLine                          Restore = item.Restore.GetSelectedEnumItems().FirstOrDefault().Description == "Restore" ? "Y" : "N",Di2015NewLine                      }).ToList()Di2015NewLine                      select new { Id = vm.Id.Value, Channels = ch }).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var channelRows = new List<ChannelRow>();Di2015NewLine        //for (var i = 0; i < blocks[0].Channels.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < blocks[0].Channels.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var channelRow = new ChannelRow { Cells = new List<ChannelRowCell>(), Id = i+1 };Di2015NewLine            foreach (var cc in blocks.Select(block => block.Channels[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                channelRow.Cells.Add(new ChannelRowCellDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Delay = cc.Delay,Di2015NewLine                    Name = cc.Type,Di2015NewLine                    Restore = cc.Restore,Di2015NewLine                    Trigger = cc.Trigger,Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            channelRows.Add(channelRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return channelRows;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17836174Di2015UniqueSeparator    static public void PreMultiplyAlpha(this Texture2D texture) {            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Setup a render target to hold our final texture which will have premulitplied color valuesDi2015NewLine        var result = new RenderTarget2D(texture.GraphicsDevice, texture.Width, texture.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        texture.GraphicsDevice.SetRenderTarget(result);Di2015NewLine        texture.GraphicsDevice.Clear(Color.Black);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Using default blending functionDi2015NewLine        // (source  Blend.SourceAlpha) + (destination  Blend.InvSourceAlpha)Di2015NewLine        // Destination is zero so the reduces toDi2015NewLine        // (source  Blend.SourceAlpha)Di2015NewLine        // So this multiplies our color values by the alpha value and draws it to the RenderTargetDi2015NewLine        var blendColor = new BlendState {Di2015NewLine            ColorWriteChannels = ColorWriteChannels.Red | ColorWriteChannels.Green | ColorWriteChannels.Blue,Di2015NewLine            AlphaDestinationBlend = Blend.Zero,Di2015NewLine            ColorDestinationBlend = Blend.Zero,Di2015NewLine            AlphaSourceBlend = Blend.SourceAlpha,Di2015NewLine            ColorSourceBlend = Blend.SourceAlphaDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var spriteBatch = new SpriteBatch(texture.GraphicsDevice);Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.Immediate, blendColor);Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.Draw(texture, texture.Bounds, Color.White);Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.End();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Simply copy over the alpha channelDi2015NewLine        var blendAlpha = new BlendState {Di2015NewLine            ColorWriteChannels = ColorWriteChannels.Alpha,Di2015NewLine            AlphaDestinationBlend = Blend.Zero,Di2015NewLine            ColorDestinationBlend = Blend.Zero,Di2015NewLine            AlphaSourceBlend = Blend.One,Di2015NewLine            ColorSourceBlend = Blend.OneDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.Immediate, blendAlpha);Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.Draw(texture, texture.Bounds, Color.White);Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.End();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        texture.GraphicsDevice.SetRenderTarget(null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var t = new Color[result.Width * result.Height];Di2015NewLine        result.GetData(t);Di2015NewLine        texture.SetData(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17837998Di2015UniqueSeparatorIObservable
17837998Di2015UniqueSeparatorCancellationToken
17837998Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask<TResult> VeryExpensiveOperationAsync<TSource, TResult>(TSource item, CancellationToken token);Di2015NewLine
17837998Di2015UniqueSeparatorsourceDi2015NewLine    .Select(item => Observable.DeferAsync(async token =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do not yield the observable until after the operation is completedDi2015NewLine        // (ie do not just do VeryExpensiveOperation(...).ToObservable())Di2015NewLine        // because DeferAsync() will dispose of the token source as soonDi2015NewLine        // as you provide the observable (instead of when the observable completes)Di2015NewLine        var result = await VeryExpensiveOperationAsync(item, token);Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Return(result);Di2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLine    .Switch();Di2015NewLine

17837998Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid SomeTest()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create a test source where the values are how longDi2015NewLine    // the mock operation should wait to do its work.Di2015NewLine    var source = _testScheduler.CreateColdObservable<int>(...);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // records the actions (whether they completed or canceled)Di2015NewLine    List<bool> mockActionsCompleted = new List<bool>();Di2015NewLine    var resultStream = source.SelectWithCancellation((token, delay) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<string>();Di2015NewLine        var tokenRegistration = new SingleAssignmentDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // schedule an action to complete the taskDi2015NewLine        var d = _testScheduler.ScheduleRelative(delay, () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           mockActionsCompleted.Add(true);Di2015NewLine           tcs.SetResult("done " + delay);Di2015NewLine           // stop listening to the tokenDi2015NewLine           tokenRegistration.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // listen to the token and cancel the task if the token signalsDi2015NewLine        tokenRegistration.Disposable = token.Register(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           mockActionsCompleted.Add(false);Di2015NewLine           tcs.TrySetCancelled();Di2015NewLine           // cancel the scheduled taskDi2015NewLine           d.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // subscribe to resultStreamDi2015NewLine    // start the schedulerDi2015NewLine    // assert the mockActionsCompleted has the correct sequenceDi2015NewLine    // assert the results observed were what you expected.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17838310Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UnflatLoopValueInjectionUseExactMatchIfPresent : UnflatLoopValueInjection {Di2015NewLine    protected override void Inject(object source, object target) {Di2015NewLine        var targetProperties = target.GetProps().Cast<PropertyDescriptor>().AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyDescriptor sourceProp in source.GetProps()) {Di2015NewLine            var prop = sourceProp;Di2015NewLine            if (targetProperties.Any(p => p.Name == prop.Name)) {Di2015NewLine                //Exact match foundDi2015NewLine                targetProperties.First(p => p.Name == prop.Name).SetValue(target, SetValue(sourceProp.GetValue(source)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                //Fall back to UnflatLoopValueInjectionDi2015NewLine                var endpoints = UberFlatter.Unflat(sourceProp.Name, target, t => TypesMatch(prop.PropertyType, t)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                if (!endpoints.Any()) {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                var value = sourceProp.GetValue(source);Di2015NewLine                if (!AllowSetValue(value)) {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                foreach (var endpoint in endpoints) {Di2015NewLine                    endpoint.Property.SetValue(endpoint.Component, SetValue(value));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17844977Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyKeyValuePairDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly KeyValuePair<string, int> myKeyValuePair;Di2015NewLine    public MyKeyValuePair(string key, int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myKeyValuePair = new KeyValuePair<string, int>(key, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Key { get { return myKeyValuePair.Key; } }Di2015NewLine    public int Value { get { return myKeyValuePair.Value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(MyKeyValuePair a, MyKeyValuePair b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (System.Object.ReferenceEquals(a, b))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (((object)a == null) || ((object)b == null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return a.Key.Equals(b.Key, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator !=(MyKeyValuePair a, MyKeyValuePair b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !(a == b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        MyKeyValuePair p = obj as MyKeyValuePair;Di2015NewLine        if ((object)p == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this.Key == p.Key;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(MyKeyValuePair obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((object)obj == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this.Key.Equals(obj.Key, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Key.ToUpperInvariant().GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17844977Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void MyKeyValuePairCaseInsensitiveKeyComparisonWorksCorrectly()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var x = new MyKeyValuePair("testvalue", 5);Di2015NewLine    var y = new MyKeyValuePair("testvalue", 6);Di2015NewLine    var z = new MyKeyValuePair("testvalue", 7);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.True(x == x, "== identity");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True((x == y) == (y == x), "equals commutative");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True(x == y, "== if x == y");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True(y == x, "== and y == z");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True(x == z, "== then x equals z");Di2015NewLine    for (var successive_invocations = 0; successive_invocations < 3; successive_invocations++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Assert.True(x == y, "== successive invocations");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(x == null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.True(x.Equals(x), "equals identity");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True(x.Equals(y) == y.Equals(x), "equals commutative");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True(x.Equals(y), "equals if x == y");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True(y.Equals(x), "equals and y == z");Di2015NewLine    Assert.True(x.Equals(z), "equals then x equals z");Di2015NewLine    for (var successive_invocations = 0; successive_invocations < 3; successive_invocations++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Assert.True(x.Equals(y), "equals successive invocations");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(x.Equals(null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // show correct behaviorDi2015NewLine    var capi = "I";Di2015NewLine    var lowi = "i";Di2015NewLine    var capti = "";Di2015NewLine    var lowti = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.True(capi.Equals(lowi, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase), "capi == lowi");Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(capi.Equals(capti, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase), "capi != capti");Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(capi.Equals(lowti, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase), "capi != lowti");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.False(lowi.Equals(capti, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase), "lowi != capti");Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(lowi.Equals(lowti, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase), "lowi != lowti");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.False(capti.Equals(lowti, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase), "capti != lowti");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //test actual behaviorDi2015NewLine    var a = new MyKeyValuePair(capi, 1);Di2015NewLine    var b = new MyKeyValuePair(lowi, 2);Di2015NewLine    var c = new MyKeyValuePair(capti, 3);Di2015NewLine    var d = new MyKeyValuePair(lowti, 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.True(a.Equals(b), "a == b");Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(a.Equals(c), "a != c");Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(a.Equals(d), "a != d");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.False(b.Equals(c), "b != c");Di2015NewLine    Assert.False(b.Equals(d), "b != d");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.False(c.Equals(d), "c != d");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17844986Di2015UniqueSeparatorPath.Combine(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location, "Paths.txt");
17845003Di2015UniqueSeparator    public X509Certificate2 CreateSelfSignedCert(string subject,string password,DateTime expDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create DN for subject and issuerDi2015NewLine        var dn = new CX500DistinguishedName();Di2015NewLine       // dn.Encode("CN=" + subject, X500NameFlags.XCN_CERT_NAME_STR_NONE);Di2015NewLine        dn.Encode(subject, X500NameFlags.XCN_CERT_NAME_STR_NONE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a new private key for the certificateDi2015NewLine        CX509PrivateKey privateKey = new CX509PrivateKey();Di2015NewLine        privateKey.ProviderName = "Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider v1.0";Di2015NewLine        privateKey.MachineContext = true;Di2015NewLine        privateKey.Length = 2048;Di2015NewLine        privateKey.KeySpec = X509KeySpec.XCN_AT_SIGNATURE; // use is not limitedDi2015NewLine        privateKey.ExportPolicyDi2015NewLine            = X509PrivateKeyExportFlags.XCN_NCRYPT_ALLOW_PLAINTEXT_EXPORT_FLAG;Di2015NewLine        privateKey.Create();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use Sha256 hashing algorithmDi2015NewLine        var hashobj = new CObjectId();Di2015NewLine        hashobj.InitializeFromAlgorithmName(Di2015NewLine            ObjectIdGroupId.XCN_CRYPT_HASH_ALG_OID_GROUP_ID,Di2015NewLine            ObjectIdPublicKeyFlags.XCN_CRYPT_OID_INFO_PUBKEY_ANY,Di2015NewLine            AlgorithmFlags.AlgorithmFlagsNone,Di2015NewLine            "SHA256");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the self signing requestDi2015NewLine        var cert = new CX509CertificateRequestCertificate();Di2015NewLine        cert.InitializeFromPrivateKey(Di2015NewLine            X509CertificateEnrollmentContext.ContextMachine,Di2015NewLine            privateKey,Di2015NewLine            string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cert.Subject = dn;Di2015NewLine        cert.Issuer = dn; // the issuer and the subject are the sameDi2015NewLine        cert.NotBefore = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        cert.NotAfter = expDate;Di2015NewLine        cert.HashAlgorithm = hashobj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // extensions Di2015NewLine        CX509ExtensionKeyUsage ku = new CX509ExtensionKeyUsage();Di2015NewLine        ku.InitializeEncode(CERTENROLLLib.X509KeyUsageFlags.XCN_CERT_KEY_CERT_SIGN_KEY_USAGE | CERTENROLLLib.X509KeyUsageFlags.XCN_CERT_DIGITAL_SIGNATURE_KEY_USAGE);Di2015NewLine        ku.Critical = true;Di2015NewLine        cert.X509Extensions.Add((CX509Extension)ku);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CX509ExtensionBasicConstraints bc = new CX509ExtensionBasicConstraints();Di2015NewLine        bc.InitializeEncode(true,0);Di2015NewLine        bc.Critical = false;Di2015NewLine        cert.X509Extensions.Add((CX509Extension)bc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the certificate policy.Di2015NewLine        CObjectId cpOid = new CObjectId();Di2015NewLine        cpOid.InitializeFromValue("some oid");Di2015NewLine        CCertificatePolicy cp = new CCertificatePolicy();Di2015NewLine        CPolicyQualifier Qualifier = new CPolicyQualifier();Di2015NewLine        Qualifier.InitializeEncode("Policy Notice", PolicyQualifierType.PolicyQualifierTypeUserNotice);Di2015NewLine        cp.Initialize(cpOid);Di2015NewLine        cp.PolicyQualifiers.Add(Qualifier);Di2015NewLine        CCertificatePolicies cps = new CCertificatePolicies();Di2015NewLine        cps.Add(cp);Di2015NewLine        CX509ExtensionCertificatePolicies cpExt = new CX509ExtensionCertificatePolicies();Di2015NewLine        cpExt.InitializeEncode(cps);Di2015NewLine        cert.X509Extensions.Add((CX509Extension)cpExt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do the final enrollment processDi2015NewLine        var enroll = new CX509Enrollment();Di2015NewLine        enroll.InitializeFromRequest(cert); // load the certificateDi2015NewLine        string csr = enroll.CreateRequest(); // Output the request in base64Di2015NewLine        // and install it back as the responseDi2015NewLine        enroll.InstallResponse(InstallResponseRestrictionFlags.AllowUntrustedCertificate,Di2015NewLine            csr, EncodingType.XCN_CRYPT_STRING_BASE64, ""); // no passwordDi2015NewLine        // output a base64 encoded PKCS#12 so we can import it back to the .Net security classesDi2015NewLine        var base64encoded = enroll.CreatePFX( "", PFXExportOptions.PFXExportChainWithRoot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // instantiate the target class with the PKCS#12 data (and the empty password)Di2015NewLine        return new System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2(Di2015NewLine            System.Convert.FromBase64String(base64encoded), "",Di2015NewLine            // mark the private key as exportableDi2015NewLine            System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags.ExportableDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17848838Di2015UniqueSeparator// Build a javascript array with all of the select names/valuesDi2015NewLinevar options = new Array();Di2015NewLine$('#Questions1 option:not(:first)').each(function() {Di2015NewLine    $this = $(this);Di2015NewLine    options.push({ Name: $this.text(), Value: $this.val() });Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a function for re-building a select minus the chosen optionDi2015NewLinevar rebuildSelect = function($selOption, $select) {Di2015NewLine    $previouslySelected = $select.find(':selected');Di2015NewLine    $select.find("[value!=0]").remove();Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        var opt = options[i];Di2015NewLine        if (opt.Value != $selOption.val()) {Di2015NewLine            if ($previouslySelected.val() == opt.Value) {Di2015NewLine                $select.append('<option value="' + opt.Value + '" selected="selected">' + opt.Name + '</option>');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                $select.append('<option value="' + opt.Value + '">' + opt.Name + '</option>');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Wire up the event handlersDi2015NewLinevar $Questions1 = $('#Questions1');Di2015NewLinevar $Questions2 = $('#Questions2');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$Questions1.change(function() {Di2015NewLine    rebuildSelect($(this), $Questions2);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$Questions2.change(function() {Di2015NewLine    rebuildSelect($(this), $Questions1);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Go ahead and run the function once to remove the default entry from the second boxDi2015NewLinerebuildSelect($Questions1.find(':selected'), $Questions2);Di2015NewLine

17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorvirtual
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorsealed
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorget_
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparator_set
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsExplicitInterfaceImplementation(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This check is not mandatory and not cross-languages.Di2015NewLine    // How this method is named may varyDi2015NewLine    if (!property.Name.Contains("."))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (property.Name.StartsWith("get_"))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!property.GetMethod.IsFinal)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!property.GetMethod.IsVirtual)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!property.GetMethod.IsPrivate)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorMethodInfo
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsExplicitInterfaceImplementation(MethodInfo method)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Check all interfaces implemented in the type that declaresDi2015NewLine    // the method we want to check, with this we'll exclude all methodsDi2015NewLine    // that don't implement an interface methodDi2015NewLine    var declaringType = method.DeclaringType.GetType();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var implementedInterface in declaringType.GetInterfaces())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mapping = declaringType.GetInterfaceMap(implementedInterface);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If interface isn't implemented in the type that ownsDi2015NewLine        // this method then we can ignore it (for sure it's notDi2015NewLine        // an explicit implementation)Di2015NewLine        if (mapping.TargetType != declaringType)Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Is this method the implementation of this interface?Di2015NewLine        int methodIndex = Array.IndexOf(mapping.TargetMethods, method);Di2015NewLine        if (methodIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Is it true for any language? Can we just skip this check?Di2015NewLine        if (!method.IsFinal || !method.IsVirtual)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // It's not required in all languages to implement every methodDi2015NewLine        // in the interface (if the type is abstract)Di2015NewLine        string methodName = "";Di2015NewLine        if (mapping.InterfaceMethods[methodIndex] != null)Di2015NewLine            methodName = mapping.InterfaceMethods[methodIndex].Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If names don't match then it's explicitDi2015NewLine        if (!method.Name.Equals(interfaceMethodName, StringComparison.Ordinal))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17854048Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsExplicitInterfaceImplementation(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // At least one accessor must exists, I arbitrary check first forDi2015NewLine    // "get" one. Note that in Managed C++ (not C++ CLI) these methodsDi2015NewLine    // are logically separated so they may follow different rules (one of themDi2015NewLine    // is explicit and the other one is not). It's a pretty corner caseDi2015NewLine    // so we may just ignore it.Di2015NewLine    if (property.GetMethod != null)Di2015NewLine        return IsExplicitInterfaceImplementation(property.GetMethod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return IsExplicitInterfaceImplementation(property.SetMethod);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17854658Di2015UniqueSeparator public static DirectoryService Service { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IAuthenticator CreateAuthenticator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var provider = new NativeApplicationClient(GoogleAuthenticationServer.Description);Di2015NewLine        provider.ClientIdentifier = <myClientId>;Di2015NewLine        provider.ClientSecret = <myClientSecret>";Di2015NewLine        return new OAuth2Authenticator<NativeApplicationClient>(provider, GetAuthentication);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IAuthorizationState GetAuthentication(NativeApplicationClient client)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // You should use a more secure way of storing the key here asDi2015NewLine        // .NET applications can be disassembled using a reflection tool.Di2015NewLine        const string STORAGE = "bergstedts.directoryservice";Di2015NewLine        const string KEY = "y},drdzf11x9;87";Di2015NewLine        string scope = DirectoryService.Scopes.AdminDirectoryUser.GetStringValue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check if there is a cached refresh token available.Di2015NewLine        IAuthorizationState state = AuthorizationMgr.GetCachedRefreshToken(STORAGE, KEY);Di2015NewLine        if (state != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                client.RefreshToken(state);Di2015NewLine                return state; 17855835Di2015UniqueSeparator byte[] byteArray;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //To convert byte array to String Di2015NewLine string byteArrayInBase36 = Base36.ByteArrayToBase36String(byteArray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //To convert String to byte ArrayDi2015NewLine byte[] byteArray2 = Base36.Base36StringToByteArray(byteArrayInBase36);Di2015NewLine
17855835Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Base36Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine#region public methodsDi2015NewLinepublic static string ByteArrayToBase36String(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    result = Encode36((ulong)bytes.Length).PadLeft(BASE36_LENGTH_BLOC_SIZE_36, '0');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bytes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<byte[]> byteslist = SplitBytes(bytes, 8);Di2015NewLine        if (byteslist[byteslist.Count - 1].Length < 8)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] newLastArray = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine            byteslist[byteslist.Count - 1].CopyTo(newLastArray, 0);Di2015NewLine            byteslist[byteslist.Count - 1] = newLastArray;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (byte[] byteArray in byteslist)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ulong value = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //for (int i = 0; i < byteArray.Length; i++) value = value * 256 + byteArray[i];Di2015NewLine            value = BitConverter.ToUInt64(byteArray, 0);Di2015NewLine            result = result + Encode36(value).PadLeft(BASE36_BLOC_SIZE_36, '0');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static byte[] Base36StringToByteArray(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] result = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine    if (input.Length >= BASE36_LENGTH_BLOC_SIZE_36)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int arrayLength = (int)Decode36(input.Substring(0, BASE36_LENGTH_BLOC_SIZE_36));Di2015NewLine        string data = input.Remove(0, BASE36_LENGTH_BLOC_SIZE_36);Di2015NewLine        List<byte[]> bytesList = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string value36 in new List<string>(SplitStringByLength(data, BASE36_BLOC_SIZE_36)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] byteArray = BitConverter.GetBytes(Decode36(value36));Di2015NewLine            bytesList.Add(byteArray);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result = JoinBytes(bytesList);Di2015NewLine        Array.Resize(ref result, arrayLength);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region ConstDi2015NewLineprivate const int BASE36_LENGTH_BLOC_SIZE_36 = 6;Di2015NewLineprivate const int BASE36_BLOC_SIZE_36 = 13; //Encode36(ulong.MaxValue).Length;Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region private methodsDi2015NewLinestatic string _CharList36 = string.Empty;Di2015NewLinestatic private string CharList36Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_CharList36.Length < 36)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] array = new char[36];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) array[i] = (char)(i + 48);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++) array[i + 10] = (char)(i + 97);Di2015NewLine            _CharList36 = new string(array);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return _CharList36;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static List<string> SplitStringByLength(string str, int chunkSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    int i;Di2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < str.Length / chunkSize; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list.Add(str.Substring(i * chunkSize, chunkSize));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    i = i * chunkSize;Di2015NewLine    if (i < str.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        list.Add(str.Substring(i, str.Length - i));Di2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static String Encode36(ulong input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (input < 0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("input", input, "input cannot be negative");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char[] clistarr = CharList36.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    var result = new Stack<char>();Di2015NewLine    while (input != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Push(clistarr[input % 36]);Di2015NewLine        input /= 36;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new string(result.ToArray()).ToUpper();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static ulong Decode36(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var reversed = ReverseString(input.ToLower());Di2015NewLine    ulong result = 0;Di2015NewLine    int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (char c in reversed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result += (ulong)CharList36.IndexOf(c) * (ulong)Math.Pow(36, pos);Di2015NewLine        pos++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string ReverseString(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] cArray = text.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    string reverse = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < cArray.Length / 2; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char c = cArray[i];Di2015NewLine        cArray[i] = cArray[cArray.Length - 1 - i];Di2015NewLine        cArray[cArray.Length - 1 - i] = c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new string(cArray);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] StringToBytes(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = new byte[str.Length * sizeof(char)];Di2015NewLine    System.Buffer.BlockCopy(str.ToCharArray(), 0, bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    return bytes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static List<byte[]> SplitBytes(byte[] bytes, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<byte[]> result = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int position = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (bytes.Length - position > length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] temp = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < temp.Length; i++) temp[i] = bytes[i + position];Di2015NewLine        position += length;Di2015NewLine        result.Add(temp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (position < bytes.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] temp = new byte[bytes.Length - position];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i + position < bytes.Length; i++) temp[i] = bytes[i + position];Di2015NewLine        result.Add(temp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string BytesToString(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = new char[bytes.Length / sizeof(char)];Di2015NewLine    System.Buffer.BlockCopy(bytes, 0, chars, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    return new string(chars);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] JoinBytes(List<byte[]> listBytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int totalLength = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (byte[] bytes in listBytes) totalLength += bytes.Length;Di2015NewLine    byte[] result = new byte[totalLength];Di2015NewLine    int position = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (byte[] bytes in listBytes)Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < bytes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result[position] = bytes[i];Di2015NewLine            position++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
17855865Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static Expression<Func<T, bool>> CreateLike<T>(PropertyInfo prop, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "f");Di2015NewLine        var propertyAccess = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, prop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var indexOf = Expression.Call(propertyAccess, "IndexOf", null, Expression.Constant(value, typeof(string)),Expression.Constant(StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine        var like=Expression.GreaterThanOrEqual(indexOf, Expression.Constant(0));Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(like, parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17855865Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static Expression<Func<T, bool>> CreateLike<T>(PropertyInfo prop, Di2015NewLine        string value, Di2015NewLine        StringComparison comparison=StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "f");Di2015NewLine        var propertyAccess = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, prop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var indexOf = Expression.Call(propertyAccess, "IndexOf", null, Di2015NewLine            Expression.Constant(value, typeof(string)),Di2015NewLine            Expression.Constant(comparison));Di2015NewLine        var like=Expression.GreaterThanOrEqual(indexOf, Expression.Constant(0));Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(like, parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17856114Di2015UniqueSeparator   public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> FilterKey<T>(string filterText, params string[] properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof (T));Di2015NewLine            Expression[] propertyExpressions = properties.Select(Di2015NewLine                x => !string.IsNullOrEmpty(x) ? GetDeepPropertyExpression(parameter, x) : null).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression like= propertyExpressions.Select(expression => Expression.Call(expression, typeof (string).GetMethod("ToLower", Type.EmptyTypes))).Select(toLower => Expression.Call(toLower, typeof (string).GetMethod("Contains"), Expression.Constant(filterText.ToLower()))).Aggregate<MethodCallExpression, Expression>(null, (current, ex) => BuildOrExpression(current, ex));Di2015NewLine            return  Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(like, parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Expression BuildOrExpression(Expression existingExpression, Expression expressionToAdd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (existingExpression == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return expressionToAdd;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Build 'OR' expression for each propertyDi2015NewLine            return Expression.OrElse(existingExpression, expressionToAdd);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       private static Expression GetDeepPropertyExpression(Expression initialInstance, string property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression result = null;Di2015NewLine            foreach (string propertyName in property.Split('.'))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Expression instance = result ?? initialInstance;Di2015NewLine                result = Expression.Property(instance, propertyName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17859959Di2015UniqueSeparator    public DateTime ParseRequestDate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2883576/how-do-you-convert-epoch-time-in-cDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CultureInfo enUS = new CultureInfo("en-US");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var dt = "1374755180";Di2015NewLine        //var dt = "7/25/2013 6:37:31 PM";Di2015NewLine        //var dt = "2013-07-25 14:26:00";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime dateValue;Di2015NewLine        long dtLong;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Scenario #1Di2015NewLine        if (long.TryParse(dt, out dtLong))Di2015NewLine            return dtLong.FromUnixTime();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Scenario #2Di2015NewLine        if (DateTime.TryParseExact(dt, "MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss tt", enUS, DateTimeStyles.None, out dateValue))Di2015NewLine            return dateValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Scenario #3Di2015NewLine        if (DateTime.TryParseExact(dt, "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss", enUS, DateTimeStyles.None, out dateValue))Di2015NewLine            return dateValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new SomeException("Don't know how to parse...");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17859959Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DateTime ParseRequestDate()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2883576/how-do-you-convert-epoch-time-in-cDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    CultureInfo enUS = new CultureInfo("en-US");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dt = "1374755180";Di2015NewLine    //var dt = "7/25/2013 6:37:31 PM";Di2015NewLine    //var dt = "2013-07-25 14:26:00";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime dateValue;Di2015NewLine    long dtLong;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Scenario #1Di2015NewLine    if (long.TryParse(dt, out dtLong))Di2015NewLine        return dtLong.FromUnixTime();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Scenario #2 & #3Di2015NewLine    var formatStrings = new string[] { "MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss tt", "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss" };Di2015NewLine    if (DateTime.TryParseExact(dt, formatStrings, enUS, DateTimeStyles.None, out dateValue))Di2015NewLine        return dateValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new SomeException("Don't know how to parse...");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17866504Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Int64> listOfAbundantNumbers = new List<Int64>();Di2015NewLine    HashSet<Int64> listOfSums = new HashSet<Int64>();Di2015NewLine    long total = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < 20162; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (isAbundandt(i))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listOfAbundantNumbers.Add(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        total += i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < listOfAbundantNumbers.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        for (int a = 0; a <= i; a++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long temp1 = Convert.ToInt64(listOfAbundantNumbers[i]);Di2015NewLine            long temp2 = Convert.ToInt64(listOfAbundantNumbers[a]);Di2015NewLine            long num = temp1 + temp2;Di2015NewLine            listOfSums.Add(num);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < Math.Round(Math.Sqrt(input), 0, 0); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long temp = input % i;Di2015NewLine        if (temp == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            divisors.Add(i);Di2015NewLine            divisors.Add(input / i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return divisors;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Boolean isAbundandt(long input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    List<Int64> divisor = divisorList(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0;
