17876563Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble safeRatio = 0.95; //Avoiding identical height/widthDi2015NewLinedouble heightWidthRatio = virtualRectHeight / virtualRectWidth; //450 / 300Di2015NewLinedouble diffWidth = safeRatio * realRectWidth - virtualRectWidth;Di2015NewLinedouble diffHeight = safeRatio * realRectHeight - virtualRectHeight;Di2015NewLinedouble virtualRectWidth_final = virtualRectWidth;Di2015NewLinedouble virtualRectHeight_final = virtualRectHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (diffWidth <= 0 && diffHeight <= 0) //virtualRectWidth >= safeRatio*realRectWidth and virtualRectHeight >= safeRatio*realRectHeightDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int counterDec = 10;Di2015NewLine    if(Math.Abs(diffWidth) > Math.Abs(diffHeight))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         virtualRectWidth_final = safeRatio * realRectWidth + counterDec;Di2015NewLine         doDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              virtualRectWidth_final = safeRatio * realRectWidth - counterDec;Di2015NewLine              virtualRectHeight_final = virtualRectWidth_final * heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine         } while(virtualRectHeight_final > safeRatio * realRectHeight);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         virtualRectHeight_final = safeRatio * realRectHeight + counterDec;Di2015NewLine         doDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              virtualRectHeight_final = safeRatio * realRectHeight - counterDec;Di2015NewLine              virtualRectWidth_final = virtualRectHeight_final / heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine         } while(virtualRectWidth_final > safeRatio * realRectWidth);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse if (diffWidth <= 0) //virtualRectWidth >= safeRatio*realRectWidthDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    virtualRectWidth_final = safeRatio * realRectWidth;Di2015NewLine    virtualRectHeight_final = virtualRectWidth_final * heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine    if (virtualRectHeight_final >= safeRatio * realRectHeight) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        virtualRectHeight_final = safeRatio * realRectHeight;Di2015NewLine        virtualRectWidth_final = virtualRectHeight_final / heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse if (diffHeight <= 0) //virtualRectHeight >= safeRatio*realRectHeightDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    virtualRectHeight_final = safeRatio * realRectHeight;Di2015NewLine    virtualRectWidth_final = virtualRectHeight_final / heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine    if (virtualRectWidth_final >= safeRatio * realRectWidth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        virtualRectWidth_final = safeRatio * realRectWidth;Di2015NewLine        virtualRectHeight_final = virtualRectWidth_final * heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse //virtualRectWidth < safeRatio*realRectWidth && virtualRectHeight < safeRatio*realRectHeightDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (diffWidth < diffHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        virtualRectHeight_final = virtualRectWidth_final * heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        virtualRectWidth_final = virtualRectHeight_final / heightWidthRatio;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17877011Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string Encrypt(string plainText, string passPhrase, string saltValue, string hashAlgorithm, int passwordIterations, string initVector, int keySize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Convert strings into byte arrays.Di2015NewLine            // Let us assume that strings only contain ASCII codes.Di2015NewLine            // If strings include Unicode characters, use Unicode, UTF7, or UTF8 Di2015NewLine            // encoding.Di2015NewLine            var initVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine            var saltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(saltValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert our plaintext into a byte array.Di2015NewLine            // Let us assume that plaintext contains UTF8-encoded characters.Di2015NewLine            var plainTextBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(plainText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // First, we must create a password, from which the key will be derived.Di2015NewLine            // This password will be generated from the specified passphrase and Di2015NewLine            // salt value. The password will be created using the specified hash Di2015NewLine            // algorithm. Password creation can be done in several iterations.Di2015NewLine            var password = new PasswordDeriveBytes(passPhrase, saltValueBytes, hashAlgorithm, passwordIterations);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Use the password to generate pseudo-random bytes for the encryptionDi2015NewLine            // key. Specify the size of the key in bytes (instead of bits).Di2015NewLine            var keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keySize / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create uninitialized Rijndael encryption object.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // It is reasonable to set encryption mode to Cipher Block ChainingDi2015NewLine            // (CBC). Use default options for other symmetric key parameters.Di2015NewLine            var symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged { Mode = CipherMode.CBC };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Generate encryptor from the existing key bytes and initialization Di2015NewLine            // vector. Key size will be defined based on the number of the key Di2015NewLine            // bytes.Di2015NewLine            var encryptor = symmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Define memory stream which will be used to hold encrypted data.Di2015NewLine            var memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Define cryptographic stream (always use Write mode for encryption).Di2015NewLine            var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start encrypting.Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Write(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Finish encrypting.Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert our encrypted data from a memory stream into a byte array.Di2015NewLine            var cipherTextBytes = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Close both streams.Di2015NewLine            memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert encrypted data into a base64-encoded string.Di2015NewLine            var cipherText = Convert.ToBase64String(cipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return encrypted string.Di2015NewLine            return cipherText;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string Decrypt(string cipherText, string passPhrase, string saltValue, string hashAlgorithm, int passwordIterations, string initVector, int keySize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Convert strings defining encryption key characteristics into byteDi2015NewLine            // arrays. Let us assume that strings only contain ASCII codes.Di2015NewLine            // If strings include Unicode characters, use Unicode, UTF7, or UTF8Di2015NewLine            // encoding.Di2015NewLine            var initVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine            var saltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(saltValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert our ciphertext into a byte array.Di2015NewLine            var cipherTextBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // First, we must create a password, from which the key will be Di2015NewLine            // derived. This password will be generated from the specified Di2015NewLine            // passphrase and salt value. The password will be created usingDi2015NewLine            // the specified hash algorithm. Password creation can be done inDi2015NewLine            // several iterations.Di2015NewLine            var password = new PasswordDeriveBytes(passPhrase, saltValueBytes, hashAlgorithm, passwordIterations);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Use the password to generate pseudo-random bytes for the encryptionDi2015NewLine            // key. Specify the size of the key in bytes (instead of bits).Di2015NewLine            var keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keySize / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create uninitialized Rijndael encryption object.Di2015NewLine            // It is reasonable to set encryption mode to Cipher Block ChainingDi2015NewLine            // (CBC). Use default options for other symmetric key parameters.Di2015NewLine            var symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged { Mode = CipherMode.CBC };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Generate decryptor from the existing key bytes and initialization Di2015NewLine            // vector. Key size will be defined based on the number of the key Di2015NewLine            // bytes.Di2015NewLine            var decryptor = symmetricKey.CreateDecryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Define memory stream which will be used to hold encrypted data.Di2015NewLine            var memoryStream = new MemoryStream(cipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Define cryptographic stream (always use Read mode for encryption).Di2015NewLine            var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Since at this point we don't know what the size of decrypted dataDi2015NewLine            // will be, allocate the buffer long enough to hold ciphertext;Di2015NewLine            // plaintext is never longer than ciphertext.Di2015NewLine            var plainTextBytes = new byte[cipherTextBytes.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start decrypting.Di2015NewLine            var decryptedByteCount = cryptoStream.Read(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Close both streams.Di2015NewLine            memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert decrypted data into a string. Di2015NewLine            // Let us assume that the original plaintext string was UTF8-encoded.Di2015NewLine            var plainText = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(plainTextBytes, 0, decryptedByteCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return decrypted string.   Di2015NewLine            return plainText;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string EncryptData(string encryptText, string passPhrase, string saltValue, string hashAlgorithm, int passwordIterations, string initVector, int keySize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Encrypt(encryptText, passPhrase, saltValue, hashAlgorithm, passwordIterations, initVector, keySize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string DecryptData(string decryptText, string passPhrase, string saltValue, string hashAlgorithm, int passwordIterations, string initVector, int keySize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Decrypt(decryptText, passPhrase, saltValue, hashAlgorithm, passwordIterations, initVector, keySize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17877011Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string EncryptData(string encryptText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return EncryptionHelper.EncryptData(encryptText, ConfigHelper.PassPhrase, ConfigHelper.SaltValue, ConfigHelper.HashAlgorithm, ConfigHelper.PasswordIterations, ConfigHelper.InitVector, ConfigHelper.KeySize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string DecryptData(string decryptText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return EncryptionHelper.DecryptData(decryptText, ConfigHelper.PassPhrase, ConfigHelper.SaltValue, ConfigHelper.HashAlgorithm, ConfigHelper.PasswordIterations, ConfigHelper.InitVector, ConfigHelper.KeySize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17877158Di2015UniqueSeparator private static IntPtr HookCallback(Di2015NewLine                int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (nCode >= 0 && wParam == (IntPtr) WM_KEYDOWN)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int vkCode = Marshal.ReadInt32(lParam);Di2015NewLine                    //Check if the enter key is pressedDi2015NewLine                    if (vkCode == (int) Keys.Enter )Di2015NewLine                        // Do here whatever you needDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return CallNextHookEx(_hookID, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine

17886221Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Serializer for the NodaDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class ZonedDateTimeSerializer : }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets an instance of the ZonedDateTimeSerializer class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static ZonedDateTimeSerializer InstanceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return __instance; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Deserializes an object from a BsonReader.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bsonReader">The BsonReader.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="nominalType">The nominal type of the object.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="actualType">The actual type of the object.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="options">The serialization options.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// An object.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public override object Deserialize(BsonReader bsonReader, Type nominalType, Type actualType, IBsonSerializationOptions options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        VerifyTypes(nominalType, actualType, typeof(ZonedDateTime));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var bsonType = bsonReader.GetCurrentBsonType();Di2015NewLine        if (bsonType == BsonType.DateTime)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var millisecondsSinceEpoch = bsonReader.ReadDateTime();Di2015NewLine            return new Instant(millisecondsSinceEpoch).InUtc();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("Cannot deserialize ZonedDateTime from BsonType {0}.", bsonType));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Serializes an object to a BsonWriter.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bsonWriter">The BsonWriter.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="nominalType">The nominal type.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The object.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="options">The serialization options.</param>Di2015NewLine    public override void Serialize(BsonWriter bsonWriter, Type nominalType, object value, IBsonSerializationOptions options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ZonedDateTime = (ZonedDateTime)value;Di2015NewLine        bsonWriter.WriteDateTime(ZonedDateTime.ToInstant().Ticks);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

x1.ReinitialiseDateFromBitArray(bitArr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(x1.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class CompactDateManipulatorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CompactDate _date = new CompactDate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int MonthDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return BoolArrayToInt(_date.month);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine _date.day, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public int MinuteDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return BoolArrayToInt(_date.minute);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntToBoolArray(ref _date.minute, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public BitArray GetCompactedArray()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _date.GetFullArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void ReinitialiseDateFromBitArray(BitArray arr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _date.SetDate(arr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //utility methodsDi2015NewLine        void IntToBoolArray(ref bool[] bits, int input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var len = bits.Length;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bits[i] = (input & 1) == 1 ? true : false;Di2015NewLine                input >>= 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int BoolArrayToInt(bool[] bits)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (bits.Length > 32) throw new ArgumentException("Can only fit 32 bits in a int");Di2015NewLine            int r = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < bits.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (bits[i]) r |= 1 << i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return r;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return String.Format("Stored Date mm/dd/ss: {0}/{1}/{2}", Month, Day, Minute);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class CompactDateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Layout  Month(5)    Day(9)     Minute (12)Di2015NewLine        //        11111       111111111  111111111111 Di2015NewLine        public bool[] month = new bool[5];Di2015NewLine        public bool[] day = new bool[9];Di2015NewLine        public bool[] minute = new bool[12];Di2015NewLine        public BitArray GetFullArray()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int fullLen = month.Length + day.Length + minute.Length;Di2015NewLine            BitArray full = new BitArray(fullLen);Di2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < month.Length; i++,index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                full.Set(index,month[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < day.Length; i++, index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                full.Set(index, day[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < minute.Length; i++, index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                full.Set(index, minute[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return full;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void SetDate(BitArray arr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < month.Length; i++, index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                month[i] = arr.Get(index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < day.Length; i++, index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                day[i] = arr.Get(index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < minute.Length; i++, index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                minute[i] = arr.Get(index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17890156Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int[] GetPositionInGrid(int s1, int s2, int s3, int s4)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var px = ((s1 * s1) - (s2 * s2) + (this.node2.Left * this.node2.Left)) / ((double)(2 * this.node2.Left));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var py = ((s1 *s1) - (s3 * s3) + (this.node3.Left * this.node3.Left) + (this.node3.Top * this.node3.Top)) / (2 * this.node3.Top) - (this.node3.Left / (double)this.node3.Top) * px;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return new int[] { Convert.ToInt32(px), Convert.ToInt32(py) };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17895415Di2015UniqueSeparatorwith open('input.txt') as f:Di2015NewLine    indent = 8Di2015NewLine    prev_depth = -1Di2015NewLine    closes = []Di2015NewLine    for line in f:Di2015NewLine        line = line.strip()Di2015NewLine        if not line: continueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        depth = line.count('|')Di2015NewLine        while prev_depth >= depth:Di2015NewLine            prev_depth -= 1Di2015NewLine            print(closes.pop())Di2015NewLine        pad = ' ' * (depth*indent)Di2015NewLine        print(pad + 'If ({})'.format(line.lstrip('| ').split(':', 1)[0]))Di2015NewLine        print(pad + '{')Di2015NewLine        closes.append(pad + '}')Di2015NewLine        if ':' in line:Di2015NewLine            pad2 = ' ' * ((depth+1)*indent)Di2015NewLine            print(pad2 + 'Return {}'.format(line[line.find(':')+1:].strip()))Di2015NewLine        prev_depth = depthDi2015NewLine    while closes:Di2015NewLine        print(closes.pop())Di2015NewLine
17895455Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] myValues = new[] { "1", "2", "3", "4" };Di2015NewLine            Stack back = new Stack();Di2015NewLine            Stack forward = new Stack();Di2015NewLine            int maxPos = myValues.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            int minPos = 0;Di2015NewLine            int currPos = myValues.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Initial Navigation Values {0}", string.Join(",", myValues));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("User <- or -> keys to navigate between the values");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("You are on Node 4");Di2015NewLine            var key = Console.ReadKey().Key;Di2015NewLine            while (key == ConsoleKey.LeftArrow || key == ConsoleKey.RightArrow)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (currPos == minPos && key == ConsoleKey.LeftArrow)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("You cannot navigate back anymore");Di2015NewLine                    key = Console.ReadKey().Key;Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (currPos == maxPos && key == ConsoleKey.RightArrow)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("You cannot navigate forward anymore");Di2015NewLine                    key = Console.ReadKey().Key;Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (key == ConsoleKey.LeftArrow)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    forward.Push(myValues[currPos]);Di2015NewLine                    currPos -= 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (key == ConsoleKey.RightArrow)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    back.Push(forward.Pop());Di2015NewLine                    currPos += 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("You are on Node {0}", myValues[currPos]);Di2015NewLine                key = Console.ReadKey().Key;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
